ref: Kulikuwa na wimbo ambao hakuwa ameusikia awali.

src: The roof shook under the new weight.
mt: Kanisa la kifedha liliangamia kwa uwezo wa kifedha.
ref: Paa likatetemeka chini ya uzani mpya.

src: The party was very fun.
mt: Jambo lilikuwa kama vile vile.
ref: Sherehe hiyo ilifana sana.

src: It reminded me of the scent of an old library.
mt: Nilikuwa na picha ya kumbukumbu ya rejea ya kumbukumbu ya kuhifadhi vitabu.
ref: Ilinikumbusha uturi wa maktaba ya zamani.

src: We played skeeball.
mt: Tulitumia skeeball.
ref: Tulicheza skiboli.

src: The characters took me away into the Land of Oz.
mt: Wanafunzi wangu wakawiliwili na nimepewa nchi ya Oz.
ref: Wahusika walinipeleka kwenye Nchi ya Oz.

src: She saw a lot of plants.
mt: Aliona nyingi za miti.
ref: Aliona mimea wengi.

src: He leaped from one side of the room to the other to escape the dog.
mt: Alisimama kutoka moja kwa moja kwa kushika mbwa.
ref: Akaruka kutoka upande mmoja wa chumba hadi mwingine ili kumtoroka mbwa.

src: My family bought me a nice present for my birthday this year.
mt: Kwa mwaka huu, familia yangu ilimwamuru nikuwe na kitu kama cha kawaida.
ref: Familia yangu ilininunulia zawadi nzuri kwa siku yangu ya kuzaliwa mwaka huu.

src: I sent her to bed anyway, knowing she would get in trouble at school.
mt: Nilimwambia aende kwa kinga, nikiwajua atakapokwenda kwenye shule atakapokwenda katika shida.
ref: Haya hivyo nikamwambia aende kulala, nikijua kuwa atakuwa matatani shuleni.

src: The boy did not do well.
mt: Kijana hakufanya vizuri.
ref: Mvulana huyo hakufanya vizuri.

src: Then she noticed saw it.
mt: Baadaye aliona.
ref: Kisha akakiona.

src: Mark agrees to have the surgery done.
mt: Mark akubali kufanywa upasuaji.
ref: Mark akakubali kufanyiwa upasuaji.

src: In the compartment, she poured some dish soap.
mt: Katika kifaa, alipiga maji ya kuchimba.
ref: Katika kichumba, akamwaga sabuni ya vyombo.

src: The cows happily ate their dinner.
mt: Wanyama wakubwa wakarudi kwa furaha kwa chakula chao.
ref: Ngombe hao walikula chakula chao cha jioni kwa furaha.

src: She agreed on the condition that he get a job with insurance.
mt: Aliamua kwa hali ya kuwa anajua kwamba yeye atapata kazi na bima.
ref: Alikubali kwa sharti kwamba apate kazi na bima.

src: Mary sells them a very big, expensive car.
mt: Mary anashawishi naye gari kubwa na kubaini.
ref: Mary akawauzia gari kubwa ambalo ni ghali.

src: One night, six months later, the cats decided to cuddle.
mt: Jumamosi, siku moja baada ya miezi sita, wanyama wawili waliamua kujitolea.
ref: Usiku mmoja, miezi sita baadaye, paka hao wakaamua kukumbatiana.

src: He found great tiles and brought them home.
mt: Alifika na vitambaa vikubwa na kubeba nyumbani.
ref: Alipata vigae vizuri na kuvileta nyumbani.

src: They all went to the show, and had a good time
mt: Wote walipata nafasi ya kuona na kujifurahisha
ref: Wote wakaenda kwenye onyesho hilo, na wakawa na wakati mzuri

src: Men and women wept together.
mt: Wanaume na wanawake wakwenda pamoja.
ref: Wanaume na wanawake walilia wote pamoja.

src: The last seven rounds were a back and forth affair.
mt: Kipindi cha mwisho cha michezo ilikuwa kama kati na kati.
ref: Raundi saba za mwisho zilikuwa za kurushiana makonde tu.

src: Outside, his friend said, why are there ants crawling on your bag?
mt: Kinyume chake, rafiki yake alisema, nini kama wanyama wanaokaa kwenye kichwa chako?
ref: Nje, rafiki yake alisema, kwa nini kuna siafu wanaotambaa kwenye pakiti yake?

src: We designed a simple car, which actually won the derby.
mt: Tulicheseka gari la kawaida, ambalo kwa hakika lilibakiwa katika derby.
ref: Sisi tuliunda gari la kawaida, ambalo lilishinda katika shindano hilo.

src: Brian spent all winter working on his speed skating.
mt: Brian alifanya kazi yake kwa kujitolea kwa kufanya mashindano ya michezo ya kifurushi kwa muda wa barabara za kifurushi.
ref: Brian alitumia majira yote ya baridi kwenye viatu vyake vya mugurudumu vya kasi.

src: As the avalanche caught up to her she quickly jumped into some trees.
mt: Kama avalanchi ilipata kwa kufika, alimwacha kwa kujifungua katika miti.
ref: Huku mporomoko ukimfikia akaruka kwa haraka kwenye miti.

src: He watched the entire movie.
mt: Alimwachilia filamu yote.
ref: Alitazama filamu yote.

src: When he entered the building he was greeted warmly by many people.
mt: Alipokwenda ndani ya nyumba alipewa karibu na watu wengi.
ref: Alipoingia kwenye jengo alisalimiwa vizuri na watu wengi.

src: Ellen called the police in a terrible panic.
mt: Ellen alitumia simu ya polisi kwa kipinduzi kibaya.
ref: Ellen akawaita polisi akiwa ameshtuka sana.

src: Pearl's heart sank and she implored her sister to return it.
mt: Kuzunguka mabavu ya Pearl yalipata kasi na alimwambia ndugu yake kwa upole kwa kuweka tena.
ref: Moyo wa Pearl ulihuzunika na akamsihi dadake airejeshe.

src: There were fish, sea urchins, starfish - it was incredible!
mt: Kuna samaki, samaki wa bahari, samaki wa nyama - ilikuwa kama neno!
ref: Kulikuwa na samaki, wanamizi, kiti cha pweza - ilikuwa ya ajabu mno!

src: Munching her treat, she gazed at the huge, starry sky in awe.
mt: Alimkula chakula chake, alimwambia mazingira mengi ya nyota yenye kubwa, kwa hofu.
ref: Akikula vitafunio vyake, alikazia macho nyota kubwa iliyong'aa kwa mshangao.

src: She retraced her steps until she found her way back to camp.
mt: Aliingiza tena nyuma yake mpaka akapata njia yake kwa kujikuta kwa kambi.
ref: Akafuata tena nyayo zake hadi akapata njia ya kurudi kambi.

src: He carried a huge trophy after the game.
mt: Alifika na trofeti kubwa baada ya mchezo.
ref: Alibeba kikombe kikubwa baada ya mchezo huo.

src: One of his friends informed him he was also sick with food poisoning.
mt: Moja kati ya wapenzi wake alimtambua kwamba yeye pia alikuwa na ugonjwa wa kupata chakula.
ref: Mojawapo wa marafiki wake wakamwambia alikuwa pia mgonjwa kutokana na chakula kibaya.

src: It landed on his food.
mt: Ilipata kwenye chakula chake.
ref: Akatua kwenye chakula chake.

src: Christian shot the gun and broke the screen on the television.
mt: Kristo alitupa panga na kubagua mawimbi ya televisheni.
ref: Christian akafyatua bunduki na kuvunja skrini kwenye televisheni.

src: Kip stomped his way to his room and eventually fell asleep.
mt: Kip alitupilia kwa kichwa kwa kichwa hadi alipata nafasi ya kukaa na kufurudia.
ref: Kip akagonga miguu yake na kwenda chumbani mwake na mwishowe akalala.

src: Although it is difficult, he is dedicated to learning.
mt: Alitokana, lakini anavyoendana kujifunza.
ref: Ijapokuwa ilikuwa ngumu, alijitolea kusoma.

src: The teachers approached the bully about the problem.
mt: Wataalimu walipanga mabula kuhusu masuala.
ref: Walimu wakamkaripia mwonevu huyo kuhusu tatizo hilo.

src: When I looked inside, there was a dead animal.
mt: Nilipokwenda ndani, kuna wanyama mmoja ulikuwa umekufa.
ref: Nilipoangalia ndani, kulikuwa na mnyama aliyekufa.

src: Karen who was missing Sam, had a plan to fix it as well.
mt: Karen ambaye alikuwa bado hajapata Sam, alikuwa na mpango pia kufanya hivyo.
ref: Karen ambaye alikuwa anamkosa Sam, alikuwa na mpango wa kuitatua pia.

src: He used a match to light the logs.
mt: Alitumia mabati kwa ajili ya kuzima mabati.
ref: Alitumia kiberiti kuwasha kuni hizo.

src: She couldn't take the day off.
mt: Alitokana na kufanya kazi siku hiyo.
ref: Hangeweza kupumzika siku hiyo.

src: When the wedding day arrives, Jason is fluent in Hindi!
mt: Jasone anafika siku ya ndoa, anafahamu Hindi!
ref: Wakati siku ya harusi ilipowadia, Jason alikuwa na ufasaha wa Kihindi!

src: Ashley got upset.
mt: Ashley alikuwa na hasira.
ref: Ashley akakasirika.

src: At the party, we danced the whole time.
mt: Katika sherehe, tulidanganya kwa muda wote.
ref: Kwenye sherehe, tulicheza densi usiku kutwa.

src: After they were done they wrapped them in bags.
mt: Baada ya kufikia wakalipia kwa kibagamagamani.
ref: Baada ya kumaliza wakazifunga ndani ya mifuko.

src: She told me she was rich.
mt: Aliwambia nikiwa na pesa.
ref: Aliniambia kuwa alikuwa tajiri.

src: The storm brought three feet of snow to the city.
mt: Bara lililowadia lilitupa mita tatu ya barafu kwa mji.
ref: Dhoruba ilisababisha futi tatu za theluji jijini.

src: Larry got a hole in one!
mt: Larry alipata kipigo kimoja!
ref: Larry iliingiza kwa shimo kwa mpigo mmoja!

src: Later, she got hungry and headed for the kitchen, but stopped.
mt: Baadaye, alikuwa na shida ya kula na alikuwa anatarajia kufika katika chumba cha kula, lakini akakataa.
ref: Baadaye, alihisi njaa na kwenda jikoni, lakini akaacha.

src: One place called me back and I went for an interview.
mt: Moja kati ya mahali yalipata nami nilipata kibali na nikafika kwa interview.
ref: Sehemu moja walinipigia simu na nikaenda kuhojiwa.

src: After several weeks, she could get the shoes.
mt: Baada ya miezi kadhaa, alipata vipande.
ref: Baada ya wiki kadhaa, angeweza kupata viatu hivyo.

src: They hadn't said Ora couldn't take a bath!
mt: Wamekataza Ora asitwe!
ref: Hawakusema kwamba Ora hawezi kuoga!

src: On the fourth game she got a bingo.
mt: Katika mchezo wa nne alipata bingo.
ref: Kwenye mchezo wa nne alipata bingo.

src: She made it downtown just in time.
mt: Aliwakilisha mji mwa kati kwa wakati.
ref: Akafika mjini kwa wakati unaofaa.

src: She could not believe how amazing it was.
mt: Alitaka kujua kama ni kweli.
ref: Hakuamini jinsi mfuko huo ulikuwa mzuri.

src: His mother said it needed sunlight.
mt: Alimwambia mama yake kwamba lazima alipata mawingu.
ref: Mama yake alisema ulihitaji mwangaza wa jua.

src: Ranger fans are hopeful he will be a leader for their pitchers.
mt: Wafuasi wa Rangers wanamshangaa kwamba atakuwa mshauri kwa wapinzani wao.
ref: Mashabiki wa Ranger wana matumaini atakuwa kiongozi wa warusha mpira.

src: She completed the tasks on their scheduled day.
mt: Aliwafikia majukumu yao kwa siku zao za kawaida.
ref: Akakamilisha kazi kulingana na ratiba yake ya siku.

src: Chester buys the shirt because the price is so good.
mt: Chester anapata kanzu kwa sababu bei ni nzuri sana.
ref: Chester akanunua shati hilo kwa sababu bei ilikuwa nzuri.

src: Her mother wanted her to wash the dishes.
mt: Mama yake alimwambia ajeche.
ref: Mama yake alimtaka aoshe vyombo.

src: I'm dressed foolishly and still smell bad.
mt: Nilikuwa na nguo za kinyama na bado ninaishi.
ref: Nimevaa vibaya na bado nina harufu mbaya.

src: He found a twenty dollar bill on the ground.
mt: Alipata kitambulisho cha shilingi sitini kwenye ardhi.
ref: Akapata dola ishirini sakafuni.

src: Just when the concert was almost sold out, Meghan found two tickets.
mt: Kabla hajakamilika uwanja wa ndege, Meghan alijua kama kuna tiketi mbili.
ref: Tikiti za tamasha zikiwa zimesalia kidog ziishe, Meghan akapata tikiti mbili.

src: His new roommate was there, and they hit it off.
mt: Wakati mwingine, mwanamke mmoja alikuwa na mpenzi wake, na wao wakakutana.
ref: Mkazi mwenza mgeni alikuwa hapo, na wakawa marafiki.

src: She loaded a new release to her iPod.
mt: Alianza kutoa mafunzo ya kwanza kwa iPod yake.
ref: Akapakia toleo jipya kwenye iPod yake.

src: Then she snuggled up with her blanket in the corner.
mt: Baadaye alikaa kwa kitanda chake katika kona.
ref: Kisha akaingia ndani na blanketi yake kwenye kona.

src: The cop gave him a ticket and told him to fix it.
mt: Polisi alimteua tiketi na kumwambia aweke.
ref: Askari alimpa faini na kumwambia aitengeneze.

src: Minutes later, they heard a strange banging sound on the floor.
mt: Baada ya dakika chache, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kusikia saa, wakati wa kus
ref: Dakika chache baadaye, walisikia sauti ya ajabu ikigonga sakafu.

src: She drove all over the state of Florida.
mt: Alienda kote katika jimbo la Florida.
ref: Aliendesha gari kwenye jimbo lote la Florida.

src: The language and people were wonderful too.
mt: Lugha na watu waliokuwa na nia nzuri pia.
ref: Lugha na watu walikuwa wa ajabu pia.

src: Andrew asked her out on a date.
mt: Andrew alimwambia kwa kipigo.
ref: Andrew akamwomba wakutane.

src: She ran top speed and greeted annoyed stewardess.
mt: Alihutumiwa na mwenye kazi wa ndege.
ref: Akakimbia kwa kasi sana na kuwasalimia wahudumu waliokuwa wamekasirika.

src: Her eyes widened as she looked in the mirror.
mt: Umbile wake ulivuka wakati akiona nje ya mabatilifu.
ref: Macho yake yakapanuka alipokuwa akijiangalia kwenye kioo.

src: The Navy refused him because Paul couldn't swim.
mt: Jeshi la Bahari lilikataa kwa sababu Paul hakupata kujifungua.
ref: Jeshi la wanamaji wakamkataa kwa sababu Paul hangeweza kuogelea.

src: It was terrified.
mt: Ilivuruga.
ref: Alitishika.

src: It also had a great and rich history.
mt: Kwa pamoja na kuwa na historia nzuri na rahisi.
ref: Kulikuwa pia na historia nzuri na yenye ukwasi.

src: Everyone loved the candles and asked to buy one.
mt: Wote walivipenda mabakuli na kuomba kujua kwa moja.
ref: Kila mtu alipenda mishumaa hiyo na kuuliza wanunue moja.

src: They chose to watch the black entertainment channel.
mt: Waliwakiliana kwa kipindi cha habari za watu wachafu.
ref: Wakaamua kutazama kituo cha burudani za watu weusi.

src: When I came out of the dressing room, it started to rain.
mt: Nilipokwenda nje ya chumba cha kufanya kazi, mchana ulianza.
ref: Nilipotoka nje ya chumba cha kubadilishia nguo, kukaanza kunyesha.

src: His girlfriend has a cat.
mt: Mke wake ana kiti.
ref: Mpenziwe alikuwa na paka.

src: Leah goes to the interview and does really well.
mt: Leah anapokwenda kwa interview na kufanya vizuri sana.
ref: Leah akaenda kwa mahojiano na akafanya vizuri sana.

src: Thankfully I found out they had a sale.
mt: Naomba niseme kwamba nilipata habari kwamba walikuwa na malipo.
ref: Uzuri nikagundua walikuwa na mauzo.

src: He began to fall asleep.
mt: Alianza kupata shukuru.
ref: Akaanza kulala.

src: I was 30 rows from the front of the stage.
mt: Nilikuwa 30 baraza kutoka mbele ya uwanja.
ref: Nilikuwa kwenye mstari wa 30 kutoka mbele ya jukwaa.

src: Suddenly, her cat comes in her room holding something in his mouth.
mt: Kisha, kaka yake kijani akapanda ndani ya nyumba yake, akifika na kitu kipindukizwe kichwani.
ref: Kwa ghafla, paka wake akaja chumbani mwake akiwa ameshikilia kitu mdomoni mwake.

src: And he thought it would make a noticeable difference.
mt: Na alitambua kwamba itaweza kutoa athari.
ref: Na akafikiria italeta utofauti mkubwa wa kutambulika.

src: One boy said his marble was a cat's eye.
mt: Mtu mmoja alisema mabati yake ni macho ya paka.
ref: Mvulana mmoja alisema gololi yake ilikuwa ni jicho la paka.

src: Diving under their desks, the students were petrified.
mt: Wakivuta mabango yao, waliwaza.
ref: Wakijirusha chini ya madawati yao, wanafunzi waliogopa.

src: So he went to the store to buy some more.
mt: Kwa hiyo alipofika duka alipata kuuza.
ref: Kwa hivyo akaenda dukani kunua zaidi.

src: I worked hard for a few months and ate all the right foods.
mt: Nilifanya kazi kwa muda fulani na kula vyakula vyote vya kawaida.
ref: Nilifanya kazi kwa miezi michache na kula vyakula vyote vinavyofaa.

src: I burned my hand cooking dinner, fell in the lake and eaten by bugs.
mt: Nilimwaga mkono wakati wa kujifungua chakula, nilipiga kwenye ziwa na kula na wadudu.
ref: Nilichoma mkono wangu nikipika chakula cha jioni, nikaanguka ziwani na nikaliwa na vijidudu.

src: I was so upset because I had totally forgotten!
mt: Nilikuwa na shida sana kwa sababu nilikuwa na ujumbe wazi!
ref: Nilikasirika sana kwa sababu nilikuwa nimesahau kabisa!

src: She decides to set up a meeting with her boss.
mt: Anamchagua kufanya mkutano na mkuu wake.
ref: Anaamua kupanga mkutano na bosi wake.

src: We realized greatly overestimated how hard it was to make candy.
mt: Tulijua kubwa zaidi tulikuwa tayari kwa kujua kazi ni ngumu.
ref: Tuligundua tulikadiria kupita kiasu kuwa ni vingumu sana kutengeneza pipi.

src: Will did not want to clean up the school bathrooms.
mt: Will hakuwa na ahadi ya kuchimba vyumba vya shule.
ref: Will hakutaka kusafisha bafu za shule.

src: Both Emily and the nurse were surprised and in pain.
mt: Emily na daktari wote walikuwa na haba na nguvu.
ref: Emily na muuguzi walishangazwa na walikuwa na maumivu.

src: We went outside and got out gear.
mt: Tulipofika nje na kupata vitu vyetu.
ref: Tulitoka nje na kukatoa gia.

src: I went home and decided to try and fix my mouse.
mt: Nilipotea nyumbani na kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma kujituma
ref: Nilikwenda nyumbani na nikaamua kujaribu kutengeneza kipanya changu.

src: She arrived in class 25 minutes late.
mt: Alifika kwa kipindi cha dakika 25.
ref: Alifika darasani akiwa amechelewa na muda wa dakika 25.

src: The other skier told me his name was Jack and it was nice to meet me.
mt: Rubani mwingine alisema jina lake ni Jack na ni rahisi kuwajua.
ref: Mtelezaji mwingine aliniambia anaitwa Jack na ilifurahua kukutana nami.

src: So he made a desk out of it.
mt: Kwa hiyo alifanya meza kutoka kwake.
ref: Kwa hivyo akatengeneza dawati nayo.

src: He ran screaming from the tent.
mt: Aliruka kwa kujisikia kutoka kwa tenda.
ref: Alikimbia akipiga mayowe kutoka hemani.

src: He emailed his resume to the recruiter.
mt: Alielewa kwa barua pepe kwa meneja.
ref: Alituma barua pepe ya wasifu wake kwa waajiri.

src: His friends loved his cooking and encouraged him.
mt: Wanafunzi wake walimwita kwa kuwa wamewaza chakula chake na kuwafanya aweze kufanya kazi.
ref: Marafiki wake walipenda upishi wake na walimtia moyo.

src: Then they all started to laugh and eat with their hands.
mt: Baadaye wote wakapata hofu na kula na mikono yao.
ref: Kisha wote wakaanza kucheka na kula wakitumia mikono yao.

src: Emily was happy and decided to stay inside and read on her day off.
mt: Emily alikuwa na furaha na kudumu ndani na kusoma kwa siku yake ya kazi.
ref: Emily alifurahi na akaamua kukaa nyumbani na kusoma siku yake ya kupumzika.

src: The nail technician suggested a design that used multiple colors.
mt: Teknolojia ya kisawasawa alisema mradi uliopendekezwa ulitumia rangi nyingi.
ref: Mtunzajo wa mikono na kucha alipendekeza muundo ambao ulitumia rangi nyingi.

src: At the very end, they fell through a trick floor into a bunch of goo.
mt: Kwa mwisho, wakati wao wakapata kichwa cha kifurushi, wakapata kwa kujikuta katika kundi la kuchafua.

src: Soon he was wrestling professionally.

src: She got a small tiara tattoo on her shoulder.

src: Then she poured in vinegar.

src: Jaclyn kept saying very snide comments and remarks

src: They obliged.

src: Todd is not sure what to do.

mt: Kwa mtu mmoja, safari ilikuwa kama ilikuwa ndogo zaidi.
ref: Safari hiyo ilionekana fupi sana nikiwa na mtu wa kuzungumza naye.

mt: Baada ya kujiunga na chama, alianza kucheza na wajawazito wanaocheza na wale ambao alijifunua wao.
ref: Baada ya kujiunga akaanza kucheza na wasichana ambao alikutana nao mtandaoni.

src: Bobby's favorite activity was riding on the ferris wheel.
mt: Shughuli yake ya kipekee ilikuwa kupanda kwa mabanda.
ref: Shughuli ambayo Bobby alipenda ilikuwa akiendesha kwenye feri.

src: I kept listening but it never came up.
mt: Nilikuwa nimekuwa nimekikila lakini haukutana.
ref: Niliendelea kusikiliza lakini haikusemwa.

src: She soon died, and Al was completely devastated.
mt: Aliacha kufa, na Al alikuwa na hasara kubwa.
ref: Alikufa baadate, na Al alivunjika moyo kabisa.

src: It costs me a lot of money to get them all off my record.
mt: Inaingiza nafasi kubwa kwa pesa kwa kufuta yote kutoka kwa rekodi yangu.
ref: Inanigharimu pesa nyingi kuziondoa zote kwenye rekodi yangu.

src: On his trip, he eats local food and sees amazing sights.
mt: Katika safari yake, anaelewa chakula cha kawaida na kushuhudia vitu vingi.
ref: Katika safari yake, hukula chakula cha huko na kuona maeneo ya kushangaza.

src: She got braces and was in a lot of pain.
mt: Aliweka mabungo na alikuwa katika maradhi mengi.
ref: Aliwekwa vifaa vya kubana meano na alikuwa na maumivu mengi.

src: Then she helped harvest the veggies from the garden.
mt: Baadaye alifanya kazi za kujitegemea katika shamba.
ref: Kisha alisaidia kuvuna mboga kutoka kwenye bustani.

src: Seth realizes in terror that he needs to find new work.
mt: Seth anajua katika hofu kwamba anahitaji kujenga kazi mpya.
ref: Seth anatambua kwa hofu kwamba anahitaji kutafuta kazi mpya.

src: They called a tow truck to tow the car home.
mt: Wakati huo wakapata gari la kubeba kwa kubeba na kubeba gari hilo.
ref: Waliita gari la kuvuta ili kulivuta gari nyumbani.

src: It caught his apartment on fire.
mt: Linakataa nyumba yake.
ref: Ilichoma nyumba yake.

src: He already knew how he would cast his votes.
mt: Alielewa jinsi alivyotaka kuchagua.
ref: Tayari alikuwa anajua jinsi atakavayopiga kura zake.

src: Johnny had to put on the donut and drive to a repair shop.
mt: Johnny alishindwa kufanya donut na kufika kwenye duka la ushauri.
ref: Johnny alilazimika kuweka tairi ndogo na aende kwa duka la kukarabati.

src: Amy visited the apartment to see it in person.
mt: Amy alizunguka nyumba kwa ajili ya kufanya mazungumzo.
ref: Amy alitembelea nyumba hiyo kuiona kibinafsi.

src: Before anybody could say anything I licked it.
mt: Kabla ya mtu kuongea nimepiga kichwa.
ref: Kabla ya mtu yeyote kusema chochote, niliilamba.

src: After applying to adopt May and being approved, Cathy adopted May.
mt: Baada ya kufanya mapendekezo kwa kuadhibu May na kufanyika, Cathy alikuwa anadhibu May.
ref: Baada ya kutuma ombi la kumlea May na kuidhinishwa, Cathy alimchukua May.

src: Monica decided to knit her a scarf.
mt: Monica aliamua kufanya kizungu cha kifungua kwa mke wake.
ref: Monica akaamua kumshonea skafu.

src: He calmly walked out of the front of the police station.
mt: Alifika kwa muda kwa muda kutoka nyuma ya polisi.
ref: Akatembea polepole mbele ya kituo cha polisi.

src: But, they don't want to hurt their parents feelings so they stay away
mt: Lakini, wanaoingia hawana haki ya kuwahalalisha wazazi wao, kwa hiyo wanaendelea kwa muda
ref: Lakini, hawataki kuumiza hisia za wazazi wao kwa hivyo wakaachana

src: As he left, he shook my hand!
mt: Kama alivyoacha, alimshikilia mkono wangu!
ref: Alipokuwa akiondoka, akanisalimia kwa mkono!

src: Jake even saw his favorite player during the game!
mt: Jake pia aliona mchezaji wake mwenye wema wakati wa mchezo!
ref: Hata Jake alimwona mchezaji wake anayempenda wakati wa mchezo huu!

src: I found a local lake beach to visit.
mt: Nilipata bweni la ziwa la kufika.
ref: Nikapata ufuo wa ziwa lililo karibu la kutembelea.

src: She produced a paper she was proud of.
mt: Aliweza kutengeneza kitabu kilichokuwa chenye heshima.
ref: Akawasilisha kazi ambayo alijivunia.

src: He cut all the lumber, assembled the desk, and stained it.
mt: Alifuta vyombo vyote vya kivuli, alianza kuziba meza, na akakata.
ref: Akakata mbao zote, akaunganisha dawati, na kuipaka rangi.

src: Then on his way to the hospital he hits a deer.
mt: Baadaye akafika hospitali anapofika akapata mbwa.
ref: Kisha akiwa njiani kwenda hospitalini akagonga kulungu.

src: One Saturday, his son sat down on the couch and leaned on Jon's arm.
mt: Jumamosi, mtoto wake akapanda kwenye sofa na kufuata mkono wa Jon.
ref: Jumamosi moja, mtoto wake wa kiume alikaa kwenye kochi na kulalalia mkono wa Jon.

src: Ben followed the string to see where it went.
mt: Ben alifuatilia neno kwa neno ili kupata wapi lilienda.
ref: Ben akafuata kamba hiyo ili kuona inaenda wapi.

src: Eventually he got added to small shows.
mt: Kwa hatua alipatikana katika michezo machache.
ref: Mwishowe akaongezwa katika maonyesho madogo.

src: The two discussed baby names for nearly half an hour.
mt: Wawili wakusudia jina la mtoto kwa takribani dakika 30.
ref: Wawili hao wakajadiliana majina ya watoto kwa karibu nusu saa.

src: The next week a healthy organic juice shop opens.
mt: Juzi kwa majuma, duka la maji ya kipindu cha afya ya kibinadamu linapata kibali.
ref: Wiki iliyofuata duka la sharubati halisi yenye afya ikafungulia.

src: They realize that they are in the same Chemistry class.
mt: Wanaona kwamba wako katika kipindi cha kemia cha kujifunza.
ref: Wakagundua kwamba wako katika darasa moja la Kemia.

src: Tom didn't understand why, but he didn't care.
mt: Tom hakuwa na uwezo wa kuelewa kwa nini, lakini hakutaka.
ref: Tom hakuelewa ni kwa nini, lakini hakujali.

src: Suddenly a big black bird swooped in from out of nowhere.
mt: Kisha mchua mkubwa wa rangi ya kijivu kushuka kutoka kwa nje kwa kujitokeza.
ref: Kwa ghafla ndege mmoja mkubwa mweusi akapita mbele bila kutazamiwa.

src: Her mom decided to craft the hoops herself at home.
mt: Mama yake aliamua kujenga kipande kipande kwa nyumba yake.
ref: Mama yake akaamua kumtengenezea pete hiyo mwenyewe nyumbani.

src: We became good friends.
mt: Tukapata rafiki.
ref: Tukawa marafiki wazuri.

src: His team won!
mt: Kikundi chake chakwisha!
ref: Timu yake ilishinda!

src: Finally, Flora had to call for a dentist appointment.
mt: Kwa sasa, Flora alitaka kufanya kikao cha daktari.
ref: Mwishowe, Flora akalazimika kupiga simu kuweka miadi na daktari wa meno.

src: Derek got a library card!
mt: Derek alipata kadhaa ya kibao!
ref: Derek alipata kadi ya maktaba!

src: None of us bought anything, and we talked for hours.
mt: Hatukupata kitu chochote, na tulijadili saa nyingi.
ref: Hakuna mmoja wetu aliyenunua kitu chochote, na tuliongea kwa saa kadhaa.

src: She smiled but didn't seem interested.
mt: Aliwachukia lakini hakupenda.
ref: Akatabasamu lakini hakuonekana kuvutiwa.

src: It tells him work is cancelled because it's snowing.
mt: Anasema kwamba kazi yake imechukuliwa kwa sababu ina mvua.
ref: Ujumbe huo ukasema kazi imeghairishwa kwa sababu kuna theluji.

src: He watched from the sidewalk as a man rode away with his bike.
mt: Alimwona kutoka kwa barabara kama mmoja alikuwa akimwaga kwa pikipiki yake.
ref: Akatazama kando ya njia mtu akienda na baisikeli yake.

src: He packs up a tent and goes camping for a long weekend.
mt: Anapakua tenda na kufika kwa wiki za kawaida.
ref: Akafunganya hema na kwenda kupiga kambi wikendi ndefu.

src: It contained hundreds of dollars and Pete really wanted a new TV.
mt: Imeandaa dola zaidi ya miezi na Pete alitaka TV mpya.
ref: Ilikuwa na mamia ya madola na Pete alitaka sana TV mpya.

src: Sally looked at herself in a different way.
mt: Sally alimwona kwa njia tofauti.
ref: Sally akajiangilia kwa njia tofauti.

src: Thankfully, there was no fracture.
mt: Kwa bahati mbaya, hakuna kifurushi.
ref: Kwa uzuri, hakukua na kuvunjika.

mt: Kwa kipindi cha mwisho anawapa kipande cha kula cha kujifungua.
ref: Katika juhudi ya mwisho akampa biskuti ya kuota meno.

src: They chased after me in an angry fashion.
mt: Wakakata kwa mwenendo wa chuki.
ref: Wakanifukuza kwa njia ya hasira.

src: He used it a few times and then forgot about it.
mt: Alivitumia mara chache na kisha kuficha.
ref: Aliitumia mara chache na kisha akasahau kuihusu.

src: All the people but Lewis ran back towards the cave's entrance.
mt: Wote waliokwenda kwa Lewis waliingia kwa kichwa kichwa kwenye kifaru cha kichwa cha kimbilio.
ref: watu wote isipokuwa Lewis wakakimbia kuwadia kiingilio cha pango.

src: Sara picked her favorite and they brought it to the counter.
mt: Sara alipanga kile chake na wakati huo wakati wao wakapata kwa kuchukua kwa kuchukua.
ref: Sara alichukua aliyoipenda na wakaileta kwenye kaunta.

src: When he woke up Friday morning almost a foot of snow had fallen!
mt: Japo alipokwama asubuhi ya Jumatatu kama kipande cha chini cha barafu ilipotea!
ref: Alipoamka Ijumaa asubuhi theluthi nyingi ilikuwa imemwagika!

src: As the days went by her cooking began to slowly get better.
mt: Kwa siku zinavyopita, kazi yake ya kujifungua kuzidi kuwa bora.
ref: Huku siku zikiendelea kupita mapishhi yake yakaanza kuimarika polepole.

src: He got very sick, out of nowhere.
mt: Alipata ugonjwa mkubwa, kwa sababu isipokuwa kwa sababu.
ref: Akakuwa mgonjwa sana kwa ghafla.

src: So they hired a professional carpet cleaner.
mt: Kwa hiyo wakapata kazi ya mtu mwenye kazi ya kupuliza kifani.
ref: Kwa hivyo wakamwajiri msafishaji mtaalamu wa zulia.

src: The hot cocoa tasted boring.
mt: Kawa cha kahawa kimejaa.
ref: Kokoa hiyo moyo ilionja vibaya.

src: She ordered herself a dozen hot wings.
mt: Aliamua kwa ajili yake wakati wa kula wanyama wawili wakati wa kula wanyama wawili.
ref: Alijiagizia dazeni ya mabaya ya kuku yenye pilipili.

src: My brother then got into a fight who should have it the first day.
mt: Baada ya hapo ndugu yangu alianza kujitetea kwa kushindwa kwa kila siku.
ref: Kisha ndugu yangu akapigana kuhusu ni nani anapaswa kuwa nayo siku ya kwanza.

src: Ivy quickly braced in the crash position.
mt: Ivy kwa haraka alivamia nafasi ya kujitetea katika anga.
ref: Kwa haraka Ivy akajiweka katika mkao wa kuanguka.

src: They hung his work on the fridge for everyone to admire.
mt: Walivuta kazi yake kwenye kifaa cha kuchoma kwa wote kujifunza.
ref: Walihangika kazi yake kwenye friji ili kila mtu aitamani.

src: This content, however, lacked polish and needed refinement.
mt: Kifaa hiki, kwa sababu, hakikuliwa na lazima liwekezwe.
ref: Hata hivyo, maudhui haya, yalikosa ustadi na yalipaswa kuboreshwa.

src: When he went home he found out great news.
mt: Alipokwenda nyumbani alijua habari nzuri.
ref: Alipoenda nyumbani alipata habari njema.

src: There was no soap there either.
mt: Kuna sabuni pia.
ref: Hakukuwa na sabuni hapo pia.

src: Mother was happy when they finally arrived in the house.
mt: Mama alikuwa na furaha wakati wote wakapata ndani ya nyumba.
ref: Mama alifurahi wakati mwishowe walifika nyumbani.

src: It made her sad to have to chose.
mt: Linamfanya aache kujua kama kuchagua ni kitu kipya.
ref: Ilimfanya ahuzunike kulazimika kuchagua.

src: Jill got her diploma.
mt: Jill alipata diploma yake.
ref: Jill alipata diploma yake.

src: Finally he became a reasonably good guitar player.
mt: Kisha kufika kwa kiasi kikubwa, alikuwa mwanamuziki wa gitaa bora.
ref: Mwishowe akawa mchezaji mzuri kiasi wa gita.

src: He managed to add a new figure once a month or so.
mt: Alifanya kujaza kifurushi mpya mara moja kwa mwezi au mara kama hizo.
ref: Aliweza kuongezea mhusika mpya kila mwezi au zaidi.

src: All of her friends complimented how great they looked.
mt: Wote wao wafuasi wakamwambia ni vizuri sana.
ref: Marafiki wake wote walipongeza jinsi vilivyokuwa vikionekana vizuri.

src: I did this all the time in elementary school.
mt: Nilikuwa nikitumia kila wakati katika shule ya msingi.
ref: Nilifanya hivyo kila wakati katika shule ya chekechea.

src: No one could read or understand the letter.
mt: Hakuna mtu aliyeweza kuelewa au kurejea barua hiyo.
ref: Hakuna mtu aliyeweza kusoma au kuelewa barua hiyo.

src: The next day, Deb's husband set her up with a interview at his job.
mt: Jana, Deb's mke alimwajibika na kuandikia kazi katika kazi yake.
ref: Siku iliyofuata, mume wa Deb alimpangia mahojiano kazini kwake.

src: She got a laser hair removal treatment.
mt: Aliipata ufunguzi wa nywele kwa laser.
ref: Alipata matibabu ya kuondoa nywele ya leza.

src: Traffic was creeping along slowly.
mt: Ugonjwa ulikuwa unapanda kwa kasi.
ref: Trafiki ilikuwa ikisonga polepole.

src: The old pastor walked over from next door.
mt: Pastari mwenye umri wa kawaida alipita kutoka kwa jirani.
ref: Mchungaji mzee alikuja kutoka nyumba iliyofuata.

src: Then Bob bought a navigation system to help him learn his way around.
mt: Baadaye Bob alipata mfumo wa kuzingatia kufundisha jinsi ya kujua.
ref: Kisha Bob alinunua mfumo wa urambazaji wa kumsaidia kwenda sehemu mbalimbali.

src: But she wondered if they could live in the wild.
mt: Lakini alivyokata tamaa kama wengine wataishi katika hali ya wabehewa.
ref: Lakini alijiuliza ikiwa wangeweza kuishi porini.

src: Her mother cried while watching through the museum.
mt: Mama yake alikimbia wakati wa kufurahia kwa kushuhudia kwa kwa mabwana.
ref: Mama yake alilia akitazama kupitia njia ya jumba la makumbusho.

src: She had to call her mom for help.
mt: Aliachilia mama yake kwa msaada.
ref: Ililazimika ampigie mama yake kupata msaada.

src: It said she wanted to break up with me.
mt: Alisema alitaka kufuta nasi.
ref: Ilisema alitaka kuniacha.

src: He decided to have an affair.
mt: Alisema atakae na ndoa.
ref: Akaamua kuanzisha uhusiano nje ya ndoa.

src: It did, however, wet its eyes with its nictitating membrane.
mt: Kwa mujibu wa taarifa, ilimwaga macho yake kwa mabavu yake.
ref: Hata hivyo, alilowanisha macho yake na utando wake wa kupepesa.

src: Then she jumped in the pool to swim with the dolphins.
mt: Baadaye alimwachia maji ya bili kwa kupiga kwa wanyama wadogo.
ref: Kisha akaruka kwenye dimbwi kuogelea na pomboo.

src: Lia got out of the bus to look.
mt: Lia alipata nje ya basi ili kufika.
ref: Lia alishuka kwenye basi kuangalia.

src: I found a pack of paper towels.
mt: Nilipata pakiti ya vitu vya kuchoma.
ref: Nikapata pakiti ya taulo za karatasi.

src: Arthur didn't want to take the last one.
mt: Arthur hakuwa na ahadi ya kutumia yule mmoja.
ref: Arthur hakutaka kuchukua ya mwisho.

src: Her friends all compliment her on how good it looks.
mt: Wanawake wake wote wanakupendelea kwa jinsi inavyoonekana.
ref: Marafiki wake wote wanampongeza kwa jinsi zinavyoonekana nzuri.

src: After paying the salesman as well, Jill got her new car.
mt: Baada ya kuchanganya na mwenyebiashara, Jill alipata gari lake mpya.
ref: Baada ya kumlipa muuzaji huyo pia, Jill alipata gari lake jipya.

src: Jaden's girlfriend came home and found the treats.
mt: Jaden's mke alikwenda nyumbani na kuona chakula cha kufurahisha.
ref: Mpenzi wa Jaden alifika nyumbani na kupata zawadi.

src: At the end of the week he took off his training wheels.
mt: Kisha mwezi mmoja, alitoka na mabara yake.
ref: Mwisho wa wiki, aliondoa magurudumu yake ya mazoezi.

src: It was an exhilarating experience.
mt: Ilikuwa na nafasi ya kujifungua.
ref: Ilikuwa ni uzoefu wa kufurahisha.

src: The server brought them back to the cook.
mt: Kisha mabibi wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya kazi, wakati wa kufanya
ref: Mhudumu akazirudisha kwa mpishi.

src: Upon arriving we met a black lab who we all automatically loved.
mt: Kwa kuzunguka tukapata labu mweupe ambaye tukapenda kila mmoja.
ref: Baada ya kuwasili tulikutana na lab nyeusi ambaye sisi sote tulimpenda moja kwa moja.

src: She discovered they needed more water.
mt: Alijifunza kwamba wengine wanahitaji zaidi maji.
ref: Aligundua yanahitaji maji zaidi.

src: The TV screen cracked right down the center.
mt: Ekraani ya TV ilipata kipimo kikubwa kati yake.
ref: Skrini ya TV ilipasuka katikati.

src: I stood in the doorway for a while.
mt: Nilikuwa nimekwama katika kioo kwa muda.
ref: Nilisimama mbele ya mlango kwa muda.

src: His mother came home and saw all the closet doors broken.
mt: Mama yake alikwenda nyumbani na kuona vitabu vya ndani vya kambi zote vimeharibiwa.
ref: Mama yake alifika nyumbani na akaona milango yote ya kabati imevunjwa.

src: I did just as it asked.
mt: Nilimfanya kama ilivyotaka.
ref: Nilifanya ilivyosema.

src: Looking around, he saw his archenemy holding a straw.
mt: Kuona kwa macho, aliona archenemuyake yake akifanya kazi kwa kipande.
ref: Alipotazama kote, alimuona adui yake mkuu ameshika mrija.

src: He buys them and immediately starts listening to music.
mt: Anapokupata, anafanya kuchimba muziki.
ref: Anavinunua na mara moja kuanza kusikiliza muziki.

src: He ended up sitting in the upper deck.
mt: Alipokwenda kushika katika barabara ya juu.
ref: Hatimaye alikaa kwenye sitaha ya juu.

src: He always swallowed them anyways.
mt: Alitupilia kila mara.
ref: Hata hivyo alizimeza.

src: They responded that her work hadn't been good enough.
mt: Wakati wa kujibu, wakasema kazi yake haikuwa nzuri kiasi.
ref: Walijibu kuwa kazi yake haikuwa nzuri sana.

src: When her Dad came home she explained the situation and Dad smiled.
mt: Alipokuja nyumbani, baba alimwambia mazingira na Baba alimwambia.
ref: Baba yake alipofika nyumbani alielezea hali hiyo na baba akatabasamu.

src: On Andy's birthday his mother gave him a bike.
mt: Kwa siku ya kuzaliwa kwa Andy mama yake alimpa moto.
ref: Siku ya kuzaliwa ya Andy mama yake alimpa baiskeli.

src: He told her that she won a special contest.
mt: Alimwambia kwamba alikuwa mshindi wa mashindano yake.
ref: Alimwambia kwamba alishinda shindano maalum.

src: He had dropped his cotton candy into a puddle.
mt: Alitupa kifungu chake cha ngozi kwenye kifaru.
ref: Alikuwa ameangusha pipi yake ya pamba kwenye kidimbwi.

src: Sebastian decided that being outdoors was better.
mt: Sebastian aliamua kuwa nje ya nyumba ni bora.
ref: Sebastian aliamua kuwa ni bira kwenda nje.

src: They got there with time to spare.
mt: Wakapata wakati wao wakati wa kupata wakati wao.
ref: Walifika huko mapema.

src: She called her bank, who reversed the charges.
mt: Aliwataja benki yake, ambaye alivuruga kodi.
ref: Alipigia benki yake simu, ambao walirejesha malipo.

src: The painting was of a waterfall.
mt: Chitima kilikuwa cha maji yaliyotembea.
ref: Uchoraji huo ulikuwa wa maporomoko ya maji.

src: My boss took notice and called me into his office one day.
mt: Mkuu wangu alitambua na kauliza nikiwa katika ofisi yake siku moja.
ref: Bosi wangu aligundua na akaniita ofisini kwake siku moja.

src: She ended up making some friends.
mt: Alifika na kuwa na wenzake.
ref: Hatimaye alipata marafiki wachache.

src: When Dan got home his mother told him she had a surprise.
mt: Baada ya Dan kuwakamata nyumbani mama yake alisema amekuwa na habari ya kushangaza.
ref: Dani alipofika nyumbani, mama yake alimwambia alikuwa kitu cha kumshutukiza.

src: She removed the key from the chain quietly.
mt: Aliingiza mabasi kwa muda.
ref: Aliondoa ufunguo kutoka kwa mnyororo kimya kimya.

src: He moved to be with his love.
mt: Alisafirishwa kwa ajili ya mahusiano yake.
ref: Alihama awe na mpenzi wake.

src: On the last day of school he found out he passed!
mt: Jana alipokwenda kwa shule alijua kuwa alipata!
ref: Siku ya mwisho ya shule aligundua kuwa amepita!

src: Mary-Anne pet the cat, and it was love at first sight.
mt: Mary-Anne alimwita kiti, na wakati huo ni mapenzi kwa mara ya kwanza.
ref: Mary-Anne alipapasa paka huyo, na ilikuwa upendo kwa mtazamo wa kwanza.

src: I broke my ankle and was in so much pain!
mt: Nilimwaga miguu na nilikuwa katika takikishe kwa kiasi kikubwa!
ref: Nilivunjika kifundo cha mguu wangu na nilikuwa na maumivu sana!

src: The owner said we could get a discount on two dogs.
mt: Mwenyeji alisema tunaweza kupata kipaumbele kwa mbwa wawili.
ref: Mmiliki alisema tunaweza kupata punguzo kwa mbwa wawili.

src: He had escaped the big city life.
mt: Alimteka na maisha ya mji mkubwa.
ref: Alikuwa ametoroka maisha ya jiji kubwa.

src: Her mother raced to her side to care for her needs.
mt: Mama yake aliruka kwa upande wake ili kufanya kazi yake.
ref: Mama yake alikimbia alipo ili kushughulikia mahitaji yake.

src: As I join, I realize that I don't particularly like other people.
mt: Kama nilipojiunga, nilijua kuwa sijivijivu na watu wengine.
ref: Ninapoendelea kujiunga, nikagundua kuwa sipendi watu wengine sana.

src: Everyone stayed in a cabin in New Hampshire for a weekend.
mt: Wote walikuwa katika nyumba moja katika New Hampshire kwa wiki moja.
ref: Kila mtu alikaa kwenye chumba huko New Hampshire kwa wikendi moja.

src: We ordered delicious food and danced.
mt: Tulipenda chakula cha kipindukizo na kufanya dansi.
ref: Tuliagiza chakula kitamu na tukacheza dansi.

src: I had to pick it up.
mt: Nilizichagua kuchukua.
ref: Ilinibidi niichukue.

src: Bill's house got hit, and the roof ripped off.
mt: Kwa Bill, nyumba yake ilipigwa na mabati yake yalipigwa na kufichwa.
ref: Nyumba ya Bill iligongwa, na paa ikangoka kabisa

src: She found a librarian who explained the dewey decimal system.
mt: Alijua kwa kipindi kifupi kwa kufika kwa kibinadamu mmoja anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejulikana kama kibinadamu anayejul
ref: Alipata mkutubi ambaye alielezea mfumo wa dewey wa desimali.

src: He went to the next practice and scored a touchdown.
mt: Alifika kwenye mashabiki ya kujitegemea na kushinda kipigo.
ref: Alikwenda kwa mazoezi yaliyofuata na akafunga bao.

src: Finally, she remembered the lullaby her mother had sung to her.
mt: Kisha, alikumbuka nyimbo ya kujipatia nishati ambayo mama yake alimwimbi.
ref: Mwishowe, akakumbuka wimbo ambao mama yake alikuwa amemuimbia.

src: Next he peed in the wading pool.
mt: Baada ya hapo alipea katika baini la kujifungua.
ref: Halafu akakojoa kwenye kidimbwi.

src: Her teacher smiled and told Amy she would be a great artist one day.
mt: Mwalimu alimkataza Amy anaweza kuwa mwanamitindo mwenye uwezo mmoja siku nyingine.
ref: Mwalimu wake alitabasamu na kumwambia Amy atakuwa msanii maarufu siku moja.

src: Finally after the game, Joe's team won.
mt: Kisha kucheza, timu ya Joe ilishinda.
ref: Mwishowe baada ya mchezo, timu ya Joe ilishinda.

src: The interviewer informed Mark he had the job.
mt: Muandishi alimwambia Mark ameipata kazi.
ref: Mhojaji akamjulisha Mark amepata kazi hiyo.

src: Elaine deliberated on where she should go for almost an hour.
mt: Elaine alifikiri kwa muda wa masaa sita juu ya wapi atakapokwenda.
ref: Elaine alifikiri sana mahali ambapo anapaswa kwenda kwa karibu saa moja.

src: He submitted the application.
mt: Alifanya kama alivyotaka.
ref: Akawasilisha maombi.

src: Matt ended up getting too drunk and lost his phone.
mt: Matt alipata kufurika sana na kupoteza simu yake.
ref: Mwishowe Matt alilewa kupita kiasi na akapoteza simu yake.

src: Four friends played music at the party.
mt: Wanafunzi wawili walitunza muziki katika sherehe.
ref: Marafiki wanne walicheza muziki kwenye sherehe.

src: Finally it is Tyler's turn to shower.
mt: Kwa sasa ni wakati wa Tyler kushowera.
ref: Hatimaye ni zamu ya Tyler kuoga.

src: Thomas started eating healthier and going on walks.
mt: Thomas alianza kula bora na kufika kwa barabara.
ref: Thomas alianza kula vyakula vya kumpa afya na kwenda matembezi.

src: Her brother leaped out at her and gave her a good scare.
mt: Kaka yake alimkamata na kumuua kwa kujivu.
ref: Kaka yake alimrukia na akamtisha kabisa.

src: She broke both of her wrists.
mt: Alisababisha kila miguu yake kwa miguu.
ref: Alivunjika mikono yake yote miwili.

src: It turned out to be an old fish in the refrigerator.
mt: Ilipokwenda, ilikuwa kama samaki wa zamani katika chombo cha kuchoma.
ref: Ikatokea kuwa ni samaki wa zamani kwenye jokofu.

src: When he graduated, he wanted to show his appreciation.
mt: Alipokamilisha masomo, alitaka kuonyesha wokovu wake.
ref: Alipohitimu, alitaka kuonyesha shukrani yake.

src: Jill finished dressing into her toga-like white gown.
mt: Jill alifikia kufikiria kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile kufanya kazi yake kama vile k
ref: Jill alimaliza kuvaa vazi lake la gauni nyeupe.

src: It landed in the backyard of an old woman.
mt: Ilipata kwenye nyumba ya kijijini ya mwanamke mmoja.
ref: Ilitua katika uwanja wa nyuma ya nyumba ya mwanamke mzee.

src: The bars reminded me that my mother cares about me.
mt: Baraza limeshikuru kwamba mama yangu anashangaa kuhusu mimi.
ref: Baa hizo zilinikumbusha kuwa mama yangu ananijali.

src: Soon Tim was really interested!
mt: Kwa muda mfupi Tim alikuwa na umoja sana!
ref: Muda mfupi baadaye Tim alipendezwa sana!

src: Without hesitation, Danny knew just what to do.
mt: Bila kusahau, Danny alijua nini anachofanya.
ref: Bila kusita, Danny alijua atakachofanya.

src: But Tami was leaving with Rita and Mary.
mt: Lakini Tami alikuwa anarudi na Rita na Mary.
ref: Lakini Tami alikuwa akiondoka na Rita na Mary.

src: All their belongings were moved into the van.
mt: Vyombo vyao vya kila aina vilivamiwa katika gari la van.
ref: Mali yao yote ilipelekwa kwenye gari.

src: Everything that might work was broken!
mt: Kila kitu kilicho kufanya kazi kilikuwa na tamaa!
ref: Kila kitu kinachoweza kutumika kilikuwa kimevunjika!

src: Someone got very intoxicated and fell into the cake!
mt: Kisichokuwa na kitu, mtu alikuwa na ugonjwa wa kulevya na kufika katika kifamfuo!
ref: Mtu akalewa sana na akaanguka kwenye keki!

src: He got stung six times before he could escape.
mt: Alipigwa na wanyama sita kabla ya kujifukuza.
ref: Aliumwa mara sita kabla ya kuweza kutoroka.

src: Once he was done, he put them all in a bag.
mt: Baada ya kufanya, alitupa vyote katika kiti.
ref: Mara tu alipomaliza, akayaweka yote kwenye begi.

src: He showed his skills, lifting more than 250 lbs.
mt: Alionyesha uwezo wake, kufuta zaidi ya 250 lbs.
ref: Alionyesha ujuzi wake, akiinua zaidi ya lbs 250.

src: His phone fell out of his hand and landed on the ground.
mt: Simu yake ilipotea kutoka kwa mkono na kupanda kwenye ardhi.
ref: Simu yake ilianguka kutoka mkononi mwake na kutua chini ardhini.

src: She hadn't anticipated the other players would be as good as her.
mt: Alisikitika kwa sababu waliokuwa waplaya wengine wakati wa kucheza naye wangekuwa bora zaidi kuliko yake.
ref: Hakutarajia wachezaji wengine watakuwa hodari kama yeye.

src: They found some glue, and carefully glued the vase back together.
mt: Wakapata neno, na wakaweka kwa kujitawala kwa kujitawala.
ref: Walipata gundi, na kwa makini waliunganisha chombo hicho pamoja.

src: He poured his heart into the song.
mt: Alimwagia moyo wake katika nyimbo.
ref: Alifunua yalikuwa moyoni wake katika wimbo huo.

src: She got together some daffodils and chrysanthemums.
mt: Alifika pamoja daffodils na chrysanthemums.
ref: Alikusanya pamoja dafodili na chrysanthemum kadhaa.

src: Whoever makes the most shots would be the winner!
mt: Wewe anayofanya zaidi kwa kila muda ni mshindi!
ref: Yeyote anayefunga bao zaidi atakuwa mshindi!

src: Finally she has lost enough weight to wear skinny jeans.
mt: Kwa sasa anaweza kufanya jeans za mikononi.
ref: Mwishowe amepoteza uzito wa kutosha kuvaa suruali nyembamba ya jinzi.

src: It was a tropical paradise.
mt: Ilikuwa paradiso la tropiki.
ref: Palikuwa mahali pa raha pende joto jingi.

src: At first, he couldn't think of anything.
mt: Kwanza, alikuwa hajui kitu chochote.
ref: Kwanza, hangeweza kufikiria kuhusu kitu chochote.

src: Due to him being so embarrassed by his skill and passion.
mt: Kwa sababu alikuwa na shauku na ujuzi mkubwa.
ref: Kutokana na yeye kuaibika sana na ujuzi na shauku yake.

src: One day his wife told him baby three was on the way.
mt: Mmoja akiwa na mke, mke wake alisema kuwa mtoto wa tatu alikuwa anatarajiwa.
ref: Siku moja mke wake alimwambia mtoto wa tatu yumo njiani.

src: I screamed and ran all the way back to the main road.
mt: Nilimkataa na kufika kwa kila upana hadi barabara kuu.
ref: Nilipiga kelele na kukimbia hadi kwenye barabara kuu.

src: She noticed the coffee was the wrong order after she drove away.
mt: Alijifunza kwamba kahawa ilikuwa kosa baada ya kufika.
ref: Akagundua kwamba kahawa aliyoagiza haikuwa aliyoitaka baada ya kuondoka.

src: He had a lot of fun hanging out with them.
mt: Alifurahia sana kufurudia naye.
ref: Alifurahia sana kuwa nao.

src: Billy became a nurse instead of a doctor.
mt: Billy alikuwa daktari badala ya daktari.
ref: Billy akawa muuguzi badala ya daktari.

src: To his disbelief, he won $50,000!
mt: Kwa habaresho, alipata $50,000!
ref: Kwa mshangao wake, alishinda dola $50,000!

src: He debated between taking a cold shower and not showering.
mt: Alimshauriana kati ya kupata maji ya baridi na hata kupata maji.
ref: Alichanganyikiwa kati ya kuoga maji baridi na kutooga.

src: Her attempts were futile.
mt: Jitihada zake hazikupata faida.
ref: Majaribio yake yaliambulia patupu.

src: He took me to the White House, and I was so happy.
mt: Alinipeleka kwa Mji Mweupe, na nilikuwa na furaha.
ref: Alinipeleka ikulu ya White House, na nilifurahi sana.

src: She saw it when she visited, and was thrilled.
mt: Aliiona wakati wa kufika, na alikuwa na furaha.
ref: Aliiona alipotembelea huko, na alisisimka.

src: Thankfully she ended up playing perfectly.
mt: Naam, alipata kucheza vizuri.
ref: Kwa bahati nzuri alicheza vizuri sana.

src: But Ed fell asleep before it ended.
mt: Lakini Ed alipata nishati kabla ya kufika kwenye mwisho.
ref: Lakini Ed akalala kabla ya kuisha.

src: I went in this morning and signed up for the plan.
mt: Nilipokwenda hii jana na kufanya kwa kipindi cha mafunzo.
ref: Nilienda asubuhi ya leo na kujiandikisha kwa mpango huo.

src: To his surprise, the sauce came out creamy and delicious.
mt: Kwa habari yake, chakula kimejaa na kuwa na ulezi na zama.
ref: Kwa mshangao wake, mchuzi huo ulikuwa mzito na mtamu.

src: He stared at it for hours until it left.
mt: Aliangalia kwa saa kadhaa mpaka kufika.
ref: Akamwangalia kwa saa nyingi hadi akaondoka.

src: Johnny's teacher asked what was wrong.
mt: Mwalimu wa Johnny alijua kama alikuwa na kitu.
ref: Mwalimu wa Johnny akamuuliza ni nini kibaya.

src: He eventually went with the girl who wanted to see him more.
mt: Alipofika kwa mwanaume aliyemwambia anataka kufika naye zaidi.
ref: Mwishowe alichagua msichana aliyetaka kumwona zaidi.

src: After over an hour of searching they were unable to find it.
mt: Baada ya masaa 60 ya kupima, walikosa.
ref: Baada ya saa moja ya kutafuta hawakuweza kulipata.

src: But Ella was a foolish and insensitive girl who never practiced.
mt: Lakini Ella alikuwa mwanamke mchafu na mwenye mawazo mabovu ambaye hakupata mafunzo.
ref: Lakini Ella alikuwa mjinga na msichana asiyejali ambaye hakufanya mazoezi hata kidogo.

src: He decided he wanted to buy a big shotgun.
mt: Alisema alitaka kupata panga kubwa.
ref: Akaamua alitaka kununua bunduki kubwa.

src: It was cold and windswept.
mt: Ilivyokuwa kama kawaida, ilikuwa baridi na kwa kawaida.
ref: Kulikuwa na baridi na upepo.

src: His head landed on the keys and several letters were typed.
mt: Kichwa chake kilipatikana kwenye nywele na baadhi ya heri zilivutia.
ref: Kichwa chake kikalalia vitufe na herufi kadhaa zikacharazwa.

src: She went outside every night to diligently view the night sky.
mt: Alienda kwa nje kila usiku ili kudiligenta kupata mazingira ya anga.
ref: Alitoka nje kila usiku kutazama wingu la usiku.

src: After moving everything she saw a huge stain where her bed covered.
mt: Baada ya kubadilisha vitu vyote aliona ncha kubwa ambako kituo cha kinga kilikuwa.
ref: Baada ya kubadilisha kila kitu aliona doa kubwa mahali kitanda chake kilikuwa.

src: He broke into my house while we were sleeping.
mt: Alifika nyumbani yangu wakati tulikuwa wakipumzika.
ref: Akavunja nyumba yangu tulipokuwa tumelala.

src: Although I'm hurt by this I'm glad they chose what makes them happy.
mt: Kama nilivyokwama na hiki nilikuwa na furaha kwamba wao wamechagua yale yaliyowasaidia.
ref: Ijapokuwa nimeumizwa na hii ninafuraha walichagua kinachowafanya kuwa na furaha.

src: When her mom returned home with the baby, Anna was overjoyed.
mt: Kama mama yake alirudi nyumbani na mtoto, Anna alikuwa na furaha.
ref: Wakati mama yake aliporejea nyumbani na mtoto, Anna alijawa na furaha.

src: Monica dared a friend to shoplift doritos and the friend did it.
mt: Monica alimwambia rafiki yake kupiga kifua na rafiki alifanya.
ref: Monica akamthubutu rafika kuiba doritos na rafiki akafanya hivyo.

src: Ray tried to use toothpaste on his finger, but it was no use.
mt: Ray alijaribu kutumia paste ya meno kwa mkia wake, lakini haikufaa.
ref: Ray akajaribu kutumia dawa ya meno kwenye kidole chake, lakini haikusaidia.

src: The last assignment was a study guide, which took her ten minutes.
mt: Kazi ya mwisho ilikuwa kifungua, ambayo ilipata dakika 10.
ref: Kazi ya mwisho ilikuwa mwongozo wa utafiti, ambao ulimchukua dakika kumi.

src: He decided that he wanted to start his own comic book company.
mt: Alifanya kujua kwamba alitaka kuanzisha kampuni yake ya vitabu vya komik.
ref: Akaamua kwamba alitaka kuanzisha kampuni yake mwenyewe ya vitabu vya vibonzo.

src: He freaked out so much he screamed.
mt: Alisikitika kiasi hiki akasema.
ref: Akaogopa sana hadi akapiga kelele.

src: Mary asked Annabelle to be in her band.
mt: Mary alimwomba Annabelle kufanya kazi naye katika bendi yake.
ref: Mary akamwomba Annabelle awe katika bendi yake.

src: He was rushed to the local hospital.
mt: Alitupwa kwenye hospitali ya kijiji.
ref: Alikimbizwa kwenye hospitali iliyo karibu.

src: He was starving.
mt: Alikuwa akifanya kazi kwa ajili ya chakula.
ref: Alikuwa na njaa.

src: The second returned with a gross of wing nuts.
mt: Jaluo ilirudi na kipande cha wing nuts cha kutosha.
ref: Wa pili alirudi na nati.

src: The doorbell rings, it is their parents.
mt: Simu ya kwa muda inaingia, ni wazazi wao.
ref: Kengele ya mlango ikalia, ilikuwa ni wazazi wao.

src: Sal liked all the attention.
mt: Sal alikuwa akilazimika na uangalizi.
ref: Sal alipenda kushughulikiwa hivyo.

src: He promised Rebecca he would come back for her.
mt: Alimwambia Rebecca atakapokwenda kwa yeye.
ref: Akamwahidi Rebecca atarudi kumchukua.

src: Two kids and myself went to one and my husband and our son another.
mt: Watu wawili wako na mimi tulipiga kwa moja na mpenzi wangu na mtoto wetu mwingine nyingine.
ref: Watoto wawili na mimi tukaenda kwa moja na mume wangu na mtoto wetu wa kiume kwa nyingine.

src: Finally it was time for Amy to try on her own.
mt: Kisha kufika wakati wote Amy alitaka kujaribu kwa kujitegemea.
ref: Mwishowe ilikuwa ni wakati wa Amy kujaribu kuvyake.

src: Come summer, he tested it out in the lake.
mt: Kutokana na majuzo, alitafuta kujaribu katika ziwa.
ref: Ilipofika majira ya joto, aliijaribu ziwani.

src: Max did not do very well in school.
mt: Max alikuwa hakifanya vizuri sana katika shule.
ref: Max hakufanya vizuri shuleni.

src: Gina got a chance to see her grandpa in a different light.
mt: Gina alipata nafasi ya kuona baba yake kwa uhusiano tofauti.
ref: Gina alipata nafasi ya kumwona babu yake kwa njia tofauti.

src: Her boss lets her leave work.
mt: Mwenezi wake anawalazimisha kufika kazi.
ref: Bosi wake akamruhusu kuondoka kazini.

src: She told her mom about her sleeping problems.
mt: Aliwaeleza mama yake kuhusu matatizo yake ya kupumzika.
ref: Akamwelezea mama yake kuhusu matatizo yake ya kulala.

src: Finally, he landed a well-paying job.
mt: Kwa sasa, alipata kazi nzuri.
ref: Mwishowe, akapata kazi inayolipa vizuri.

src: She climbed the tall tree and realized how big the bunches were.
mt: Aliingia kwenye mti uliokaa juu na kuona kama kubwa ni makavu.
ref: Alipanda mti mrefu na kugundua jinsi migomba hiyo ilikuwa kubwa.

src: I took plenty of photos.
mt: Nilimshika picha nyingi.
ref: Nilipiga picha nyingi sana.

src: The doctor gave him ointment and some antibiotics.
mt: Daktari alimwambia kuchukua dawa ya kuchemsha na dawa za kivinjari.
ref: Daktari akampa mafuta na viuavijasumu.

src: They were always so evenly matched.
mt: Wao wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana wakipambana
ref: Kila wakati wangetoka sare kwa sare.

src: When the candy cooled they put them in bags.
mt: Baada ya chakula kuchemka wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchukua chakula wakati wa kuchuk
ref: Wakati pipi hizo zilitulia waliziweka ndani ya mifuko.

src: She was determined to get in shape.
mt: Aliwakubali kujitafutia.
ref: Alikuwa amejitolea kuwa na umbo nzuri.

src: She decided to stay in a hotel and find a new job.
mt: Aliamua kuishi katika hoteli na kujenga kazi mpya.
ref: Akaamua kuishi hotelini na kutafuta kazi mpya.

src: Wendy and daughter baked them into a delicious pie.
mt: Wendy na binti yake wakachoma kama kifungua cha kipindu.
ref: Wendy na binti yake waliyaoka kuwa pai tamu.

src: Walking home he tripped and fell.
mt: Alipokuwa anapita nyumbani alitumbukizwa na kufa.
ref: Akitembea kwenda nyumbani alitegwa na kuanguka.

src: He also found friendly locals.
mt: Alipata pia wakazi wema.
ref: Alipata pia wenyeji wazuri.

src: Finally, he was able to purchase the game.
mt: Kwa sasa, alipata kuuza mchezo huo.
ref: Mwishowe, aliweza kununua mchezo huo.

src: The stunt man was ejected from his seat.
mt: Rubani aliruka kutoka kiti chake.
ref: Mbadala huyo wa mwigizaji alirushwa kutoka kwa kiti chake.

src: He flirted too much with other girls.
mt: Alifanya kama kifungua kwa wanyama wengine.
ref: Alicheza sana na wasichana wengine kimahaba.

src: She  passed all the tests!
mt: Aliwahi kufaulu kwa kila test!
ref: Alipita mitihani yote!

src: Then I had to get everything organized.
mt: Baadaye nilipaswa kufanya kila kitu kwa kipimo.
ref: Kisha nililazimika kupanga kila kitu.

src: Hailey was told they were never going back.
mt: Hailey alitupwa kwamba wao hawataenda tena.
ref: Hailey aliambiwa hawatawahi kurudi tena.

src: They remind him of his grandma and what she meant to him.
mt: Anawasumbua kama yeye na nini aliyoyafanya kwa yeye.
ref: Inamkumbusha kuhusu bibi yake na alivyokuwa wa thamani kwake.

src: The other boys were fine but Jake fell and broke his leg!
mt: Wanawake wengine wote walikuwa bora lakini Jake alipiga kichwa na kufa na kichwa!
ref: Wavulana wengine walikuwa sawa lakini Jake alianguka na kuvunja mguu wake!

src: Soon, she decided to practice speaking German with a German friend.
mt: Kisha muda mfupi, aliamua kuangalia kujadili kwa kijamaa kijamaa.
ref: Punde si punde, akaamua kujifunza kuongea Kijerumani na rafiki Mjerumani.

src: They shopped the rest of the day.
mt: Wakafanya biashara kwa siku nzima.
ref: Wakanunua vitu siku nzima.

src: He went to the local store and purchased a waterproof phone case.
mt: Alifika duka la kijijini na kupata kifaa cha simu yenye kujikimu.
ref: Akaenda kwenye duka lililo karibu na kununua mfuko wa simu unaozuia maji.

src: Gina normally didn't like Burger King's fries.
mt: Gina kwa kawaida hakuwa na uhusika na chipsi za Burger King.
ref: Kwa kawaida Gina hapendi chipsi za Burger King.

src: I asked who it was and why they were calling.
mt: Nilipiga simu nilipenda kujua ni nani na kwa nini wanitumia simu.
ref: Nikauliza alikuwa ni nani na ni kwa nini alikuwa akipiga simu.

src: As soon as it was time for her break she dashed outside.
mt: Baada ya muda wake wa kula, alisimama kwa haraka nje.
ref: Mara tu ilipokuwa ni wakati wake wa kupumzika akatoka nje.

src: Alec's daughter made words with them rather than structures.
mt: Jina la binti yake Alec ilikuwa kujenga maneno bali si majengo.
ref: Binti ya Alec alitengeneza maneno kwa kuzitumia baadala ya miundo.

src: I was caught by the police.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechukuliwa na polisi.
ref: Nilikamatwa na polisi.

src: They gave him their entire record collection from their youth.
mt: Walimpa yote kwa rekodi yao ya muziki kutoka katika miaka yao ya kwanza.
ref: Wakampa mkusanyiko wao kamili wa rekodi kuanzia ujana wao.

src: It took 20 minutes to clean the blender.
mt: Ilipigwa dakika 20 kwa kupima blender.
ref: Ilichukua dakika 20 kusafisha mashine hiyo ya sharubati.

src: She immediately left the auditioning room.
mt: Aliacha kwa haraka jengo la kusikiliza.
ref: Akaondoka mara moja kwenye chumba cha jaribio.

src: A nice man noticed what happened and offered to pay.
mt: Kijana mwenye mwenendo mema alikuta nini kiliyotokea na kutoa fedha.
ref: Mwanaume mzuri akagundua kilichofanyika na akajitolea kulipa.

src: When she received the check there was no raise.
mt: Kama alipokabili kipato hakuna kipaumbele.
ref: Wakati alipopokea hundi lake hakukuwa na donge lolote.

src: She didn't feel ready to try out for the band.
mt: Alisikia hawakupenda kufanya kipindi cha kushirikiana na bendi.
ref: Hakuhisi tayari kujaribu kujiunga na bendi.

src: Fred got drunk and passed out on the sand.
mt: Fred alikuwa na kifafa na kufa kwenye barafu.
ref: Fred alilewa na kulala kwenye mchanga.

src: He kept going to work anyway.
mt: Alifika kazi bado.
ref: Hata hivyo aliendelea kwenda kazini.

src: Burke decides to try smiling.
mt: Burke anataka kujitambua.
ref: Burke akaamua kujaribu kutabasamu.

src: Matt was horrified and stopped to check on her.
mt: Matt alikuwa na wasiwasi na kufika kwenye mahali pake.
ref: Matt alishtuka na kusimama ili kumwangalia.

src: When he finished his act he got a standing ovation.
mt: Baada ya kufikia kile alichofanya alipata mafunzo ya kujitolea.
ref: Alipomaliza onyesho lake watu walisimama na kupiga makofi kwa furaha.

src: I went home and gathered the new items.
mt: Nilipata nyumbani na kushirikiana vitu vijavyo.
ref: Nilienda nyumbani na kukusanya vitu vipya.

src: I was so happy when my boss offered me the new position!
mt: Nilikuwa na furaha sana wakati mimi nilipewa nafasi mpya na mkuu wangu!
ref: Nilifurahi sana wakati bosi wangu alinipa kazi hii mpya!

src: Then she pressed flower blossoms into the centers of her bars.
mt: Baadaye alipiga rangi za wanyama katika mitaani za barazani.
ref: Kisha akafinya machanuo ya maua katikati mwa sabuni zake.

src: There they found some key evidence.
mt: Wakati huo wakapata mengine mengi ya kuhusika.
ref: Hapo walipata ushahidi muhimu.

src: Pat aces his test.
mt: Pat anapata kilele cha ujuzi wake.
ref: Pata akapita mtihani wake.

src: Unfortunately, she burnt the chicken and overcooked the rice.
mt: Kwa hakika, alitupa kuku na kuzikia chakula cha nazi.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, aliunguza kuku na kupika wali kupita kiasi.

src: Solomon suspected that his being hired was related to his unique name.
mt: Solomon alimwamini kwamba kujulikana kwake kwa jina lake la kawaida lilikuwa na nafasi kwenye kazi yake.
ref: Solomon alishuku kwamba kuajiriwa kwake kulihusiana na jina lake la kipekee.

src: She searched everywhere for it.
mt: Aliangalia kila mahali kwa yeye.
ref: Aliitafuta kila mahali.

src: He loved his gift from me on Christmas morning.
mt: Alimwita picha yangu ya kwanza ya kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi cha kwanza cha kipindi
ref: Alipenda zawadi yake kutoka kwangu asubuhi ya Krisimasi.

src: A week later, the restaurant got sued by the customer.
mt: Baada mwezi, restorani huo kiliwahiwa na mteja.
ref: Wiki moja baadaye, mkahawa huo ulifunguliwa mashtaka na mteja.

src: However her car was destroyed.
mt: Aliyekuwa mwenye gari hilo alipata hatia.
ref: Hata hivyo gari lake liliharibika.

src: Karen was accepted but Diane was not, which was hard for both of them.
mt: Karen alipewa nafasi lakini Diane hakupewa, ambayo ilikuwa ngumu kwa wote wawili.
ref: Karen alikubaliwa lakini Diane hakukubaliwa, ambayo ilikuwa ngumu kwa wote.

src: My husband buried her in the backyard.
mt: Mke yangu alikaburika katika kijijini.
ref: Mume wangu alimzaka nyuma ya nyumba.

src: The goat was trying to get more food from her but she ignored it.
mt: Kwenda kujipatia zaidi chakula kutoka yake, ndipo kijani alikuwa akijipatia.
ref: Mbuzi huyo alikuwa akijaribu kupata chakula zaidi kutoka kwake lakini alimpuuza.

src: Her husband is now in a hospice.
mt: Mke wake sasa anafanya kazi katika kituo cha kuhudhuria wale wanaoishi kwa muda.
ref: Mume wake sasa yumo katika hospitali ya wagonjwa mahututi.

src: When Laura got it done she loved it.
mt: Kama Laura alifanya kazi yake alivyoahidi, alivyoahidi.
ref: Wakati Laura alitengenezwa aliipenda.

src: It was so beautiful and busy!
mt: Ilivyokuwa naamuzi na kazi!

src: The man leapt as high as he could while running.
mt: Kiumbe alivuta kama alivyoweza wakati wa kufika.
ref: Mwanaume akaruka juu kadri awezavyo huku akikimbia.

src: I watched the whole movie.
mt: Nilimwona filamu kwa kabisa.

src: Once there I bought the pair I thought was best.
mt: Baada ya hapo nimechukua zile zinazotaka.

src: Sadly, he takes them into a pawn shop for sale.

src: Lance took a bullet for Adam.

src: It was way too loud and upset his parents.

src: The only problem was that it was very expensive.

src: He fractured his arm in three places.
mt: Alifichwa na kifua cha kichwa katika nne.

src: Mag relaxed and watched movies all night.

mt: Kabla hajamwona, ringi hili lilikuwa zaidi tajiri!
ref: Pete hiyo ilikuwa maridadi zaidi kwa karibu!

src: To my surprise I actually had a good time!
mt: Kwa habari yangu nilikuwa na muda mzuri!

src: My instructors told me I wasn't ready yet, and I was so hurt by it.
mt: Wataalimu wangu walimwambia nikiwa si tayari hata sasa, na nilikuwa na shida sana kwa hivyo.

src: Mary and Harry got engaged eventually.
mt: Mary na Harry wakapataa kufunga ndoa kwa mwisho.

src: She was horrified when the teacher made them run the first day.
mt: Alitukutia kwa kushindwa kufanya kazi ya kwanza.
ref: Alishtuka sana wakati mwalimu aliwafanya wakimbie siku ya kwanza.

src: It started to rainy.
mt: Kutokana na mvua kuchukua.
ref: Kukaanza kunyesha.

src: Susan drove in the rain to the very next rest stop and went in.
mt: Susan alikuwa ananyanyasa barabara kwenye mvua hadi uwanja wa kwanza na kufika.
ref: Susan akaendesha gari kwa mvua hadi kituo kilichofuata cha kupumzika na akaingia.

src: My grandfather slammed on the brakes.
mt: Jidudu yangu alitupilia kwa kasi.
ref: Babu yangu alifunga breki.

src: Ashley broke her leg and can not be in the water.
mt: Ashley alifichua miguu yake na hawezi kuwa katika maji.
ref: Ashley alivunja mguu wake na hawezi kuwa majini.

mt: Gari lilibingirika kwa kasi kubwa wakati wa kufika kwenye kifaru.
ref: Gari hilo liliruka sana lilipogonga shimo hiyo.

src: John confesses he was trying to make her like him more.
mt: John anasema alikuwa anavyotaka kumwona kama yeye anavyomwona.
ref: John alikiri alikuwa akijaribu kumfanya ampende zaidi.

src: Aurelia was amazed with how delicious her homemade ice cream was.
mt: Aurelia alimwona kama vile nafaka yake ya nyumbani ya kivuli kilikuwa na nafaka.

src: She later became a lawyer.
mt: Alikaa kama mwanasheria.
ref: Baadaye akawa wakili.

src: She wanted to see their hall pass.
mt: Alitaka kufika katika baraza la kuhakikisha.
ref: Alitaka kuona pasi yao ya ukumbini.

mt: Kwa hatia nimeacha na nimeamua kupata za kawaida.

src: She hurriedly dressed and arrived to work 5 minutes late.
mt: Aliwakaribisha na kufanya kazi 5 dakika zaidi.

src: Her mother poked her and made her give it back.

mt: Aliachwa kwa muda wa wiki kadhaa kufanya michezo ya kibao
ref: Alilazimika kufanya mazoezi ya kugonga kwa wiki kadhaa

src: I made two mugs of hot chocolate and woke up my husband.
mt: Nilimchunga mabomu mawili ya kahawa ya moto na nimepanga mke wangu.

src: He improved his shooting, dribbling, passing, and defense.
mt: Alibadili uwezo wake wa kushika, kushika, kutoa na kushinda.

src: She saved all her money in a savings account.

src: John was worried his teacher would think he was lying.

mt: Kisha muda mrefu akakwama.

src: In the big city she could be anyone and do anything she wanted.

src: Then John got up and had breakfast and felt better.

mt: Lakini pia pia zote zilikuwa na nyama kwa wakati huu.
