src: The girls loved the food.
mt: Watoto waliopenda chakula.
ref: Wasichana hao walipenda chakula hicho.

src: Levi helped poor the wax into the molds.
mt: Levi alikuwa anapimiza mabati ya kuni katika mabati.
ref: Levi alisaidia kumwaga nta kwenye umbo.

src: The screen was cracked.
mt: Ekraani lilivunjika.
ref: Skrini ilikuwa imevunjika.

src: Then he got the best wave of his life.
mt: Baadaye alipata njiwa bora zake.
ref: Kisha akapata wimbi nzuri sana kwa maisha yake.

src: Ben added leaves to his compost pile and waited until spring.
mt: Ben alifanya kazi kwa kupanga majani kwa kipande chake cha kuzingira na kuwachilia kwa muda hadi mwezi wa kwanza.
ref: Ben aliongezea matawi kwenye rundo lake la mbolea na kusubiri hadi majira ya kuchipua.

src: Joe ordered a pizza online.
mt: Joe aliamua kuzipata pizza kwa kutumia mtandao.
ref: Joe aliagiza piza mtandaoni.

src: He ran home and quickly made popcorn for the movie.
mt: Aliruka nyumbani na kufanya popcorn kwa ajili ya filamu.
ref: Akakimbia nyumbani na kutengeneza bisi kwa haraka kwa sababu ya filamu hiyo.

src: Her friends brought food and drinks to the party.
mt: Wanawake wake walikuwa wameleta chakula na dawa kwa kipindi hicho.
ref: Marafiki wake walileta chakula na vinywaji kwa sherehe hiyo.

src: Two-hundred birds were hit.
mt: Watuwa wachache wanaume waliuwa.
ref: Ndege mia mbili waligongwa.

src: Janice buys a few pairs of khakis for work.
mt: Janice anapata kifaa cha kawaida cha kipande cha kijani kwa kazi.
ref: Janice akanunua kaki kadhaa za kazini.

src: As she took a picture, she lost her balance and fell into the water.
mt: Kama alivyokuwa anapichua, alipata upelele na kufika maji.
ref: Alipokuwa akipiga picha, alipoteza usawaziko na kuanguka ndani ya maji.

src: Her hard work had paid off!
mt: Kazi yake kubwa ilipata faida!
ref: Bidii yake ilikuwa na matokeo mazuri!

src: Dismayed, his family rushed him a mean person they called Vet.
mt: Wakifurudia, familia yake wakarusha kwa mtu mwenye uwezo wao waliyemfanya kujulikana kama Vet.
ref: Kwa mfadhaiko, familia yake ilimpeleka kwa mtu ambaye wanamuita Daktari wa wanyama.

src: She pulled the timesheets to prove her point.
mt: Aliita kifungua kipande cha muda cha kazi kwa ajili ya kupongeza.
ref: Akachomoa hati ya kazi ili kuthibitisha maoni yake.

src: Nora loved to picnic by the stream.
mt: Nora alivuta kufanya chakula cha jioni kwa mto.
ref: Nora alipenda kwenda kwa mandari kando ya kijito hicho.

src: Marcy began doing this, and found it much easier to do things alone.
mt: Marcy alianza kufanya hivi, na alijua kuwa ni rahisi zaidi kufanya vitu peke yake.
ref: Marcy akaanza kufanya hivi, na akaona ni rahisi zaidi kufanya vitu peke yake.

src: Sharon feels lucky to have had Fancy since she was a puppy.
mt: Sharon anasikitika kwa kuwa na Fancy tangu alikuwa pikipiki.
ref: Sharon anahisi ana bahati kuwa na Fancy tangu alipokuwa mtoto.

src: And he had to drive himself to a hospital.
mt: Na alishindwa kufika hospitali kwa kipindi cha muda.
ref: Na alipaswa kujiendesha mwenyewe hadi hospitalini.

src: In the field, he ate his picnic.
mt: Katika mazingira, alivyelekea chakula chake.
ref: Huko uwanjani, alikula chakula chake cha mandari.

src: While happy and grateful, they were somewhat less enthused.
mt: Wakiwa na furaha na kujitakia, wakawa na ujambazi.
ref: Ijapokuwa walikuwa na furaha na wenye shukrani, walikuwa hawana msisimko sana.

src: Chris felt terrible.
mt: Chris alikuwa na uwezo mdogo.
ref: Chris alihisi vibaya.

src: Rene appreciated his offer and took him up on it.
mt: Rene alisikitika na kubakia.
ref: Rene alishukuru kwa toleo lake na akalichukua.

src: And the souvenirs were wonderful, too!
mt: Na vitabu vya kumbukumbu vikawa vizuri pia!
ref: Na vitu vya kununua vya kumbukumbu vilikuwa vizuri pia!

src: It rained and her hair got wet.
mt: Ilipigwa na mvua na nywele zake zikapigwa.
ref: Kulinyesha na nywele zake zikapata maji.

src: We've been going there for so long that the staff knows what we get.
mt: Kweli tulikuwa tukifika huko kwa muda mkubwa sana kwamba wafanyakazi wanaamini nini tunachokipata.
ref: Tumekuwa tukienda hapo kwa muda mefu sana hadi wafanyakazi wanajua tunachoagiza.

src: He saw the crime on the news that night.
mt: Aliona kosa kwenye habari ya usiku.
ref: Aliona uhalifu huo kwenye habari usiku huo.

src: Doug broke his wedding vows to Tracy.
mt: Doug alifichua naamuzi yake kwa Tracy.
ref: Doug alivunja ahadi zake za harusi kwa Tracy.

src: He decided on a new method of choosing a book.
mt: Alifanya uchaguzi mpya wa kitabu.
ref: Akaamua mbinu mpya ya kuchagua kitabu.

src: He saw the ancient Book of Kells on display there.
mt: Aliona kitabu cha Kells cha karne nyingi kwenye picha.
ref: Aliona Kitabu cha zamani cha Kells kikionyeshwa hapo.

src: His girlfriend liked to go in the water for a bit.
mt: Kabla hajamaliza, mke wake alikuwa anapenda kufika maji kwa dakika chache.
ref: Mpenzi wake alipenda kuingia kwenye maji kidogo.

src: It was cold and annoying but I was able to help put the spare on.
mt: Ilipata kuchafuka na kujitetea lakini nilikuwa na nia ya kuweka kipande cha kubadilishwa.
ref: Kulikuwa na baridi na kunakera lakini niliweza kusaidia kuweka gurudumu la ziada.

src: The power had cut out and all the ice was melted!
mt: Joto lilipotea na kila barafu lilipata kuchemsha!
ref: Umeme ulikuwa umepotea na barafu yote ilikuwa imeyeyuka!

src: The game was tied, until Harrison scored the winning point.
mt: Mechi ilikuwa ikipigana, hadi Harrison alisajili pointi ya kufuzu.
ref: Mchezo ulikuwa nunge kwa nunge, hadi Harrison alipopata alama ya ushindi.

src: She went online and decided what she'd like to buy.
mt: Aliingia kwenye mitandao na kuchagua nini alitaka kupata.
ref: Alienda mtandaoni na kuamua ni nini angependa kununua.

src: Year's later Fred references the diary to see how he spent his time.
mt: Baada ya miaka miwili Fred anarudi kwa kumbukumbu ya tukio hilo kuona jinsi alivyotumia wakati wake.
ref: Miaka kadhaa baadaye Fredi hurejelea shajara hiyo ili kuona jinsi alivyotumia muda wake.

src: And they thought the food was great too!
mt: Na wengine waliona chakula kama bora.
ref: Na walifikiria chakula kilikuwa kizuri pia!

src: They soon were shopping and chatting together all the time.
mt: Wakati mwingine wakawa wakifanya biashara na kuongea pamoja kila wakati.
ref: Punde si punde walikuwa wakienda kununua vitu pamoja na kuzungumza kila wakati.

src: The played games for hours.
mt: Waliwinda michezo kwa saa nyingi.
ref: Walicheza michezo kwa saa nyingi.

src: We talk about the old days when we used to play together outside.
mt: Hatukutafuta siku za zamani wakati tulitumia pamoja nje.
ref: Sisi huongea kuhusu siku za zamani ambazo tulikuwa tukicheza pamoja nje.

src: I tried talking to them about it and they said they'd be quieter.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechukua na kuwauliza na wao wakasema watakuwa wakifanya kazi.
ref: Nilijaribu kuongea nao kuihusi na wakasema watajaribu kuwa watulivu.

src: When he tried it on it fit perfectly.
mt: Alipokuwa anavyotumia kwa kwanza, ilikuwa inaanza kufanya kazi.
ref: Alipoijaribu ilitoshea vizuri.

src: He got very tipsy, but he remembered one thing for sure.
mt: Alikuwa na uwezo mkubwa wa kupika, lakini alikuwa na uhakika mwingi.
ref: Alilewa sana, lakini alikumbuka kitu kimoja kwa hakika.

src: He practices very hard.
mt: Anafanya kazi kwa kasi sana.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi kwa bidii sana.

src: Sai wore the sweater to picture day and got a lot of compliments.
mt: Sai alivaa kofia kwa siku ya picha na kupata mengi ya mawazo.
ref: Sai alivaa sweta hiyo siku ya kupigwa picha na akapata pongezi nyingi.

src: Before long, all ten friends had joined in the car finding adventure.
mt: Kabla ya muda gani, wote wanne wamewajibika katika kufundisha gari.
ref: Baada ya muda mfupi, marafiki wote kumi walijiunga katika tukio la kutafuta gari.

src: She asked her mother where it was.
mt: Aliwataka mama yake wapi ilipo.
ref: Akauliza mama yake alikuwa wapi.

src: Nearby residents called the police to complain about the noise.
mt: Wananchi wakapata kwa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wakati wa kushangaa wak
ref: Wakazi wa karibu wakawaita polisi kulalamika kuhusu kelele.

src: Bill almost missed the ball, but he managed to hit it.
mt: Bill alikuwa karibu kufaulu goli, lakini alikataa kufaulu.
ref: Karibu Bill akose mpira, lakini aliweza kuupiga.

src: There were only a few things in their price range.
mt: Kuna vitu vingi vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa vikubwa v
ref: Kulikuwa na vitu vichache tu vilivyoendana na bei zao.

src: She started to feed them all peanuts.
mt: Alianza kula kwa wote mboga.
ref: Akaanza kuwalisha wote njugu.

src: I held the bike as she begins cycling.
mt: Nilimwamini biki kama anafanya kwa kwanza.
ref: Nikashikilia baisikeli akianza kuendesha.

src: Inside her stomach was turning in knots.
mt: Kwa ndani ya mdomo yake mawimbi yalikuwa yakiwinda.
ref: Ndani ya tumbo lake alikuwa akihisi tumbojoto.

src: On moving day she said goodbye to her friends.
mt: Jana alisema kwa wenzake.
ref: Siku ya kuhama aliwaambia marafiki wake kwaheri.

src: Right before he came back he left a message regarding their time.
mt: Kabla ya kwenda tena alitoa maelezo kuhusu wakati wao.
ref: Kabla ya kurudi aliacha ujumbe kuhusu wakati wao.

src: I looked in the oven and the chicken was ruined.
mt: Nilisoma katika jiko na kuku ulikuwa umetupwa.
ref: Nikaangalia ndani ya oveni na kuku ilikuwa imeharibika.

src: When she got to school, she saw a sign that said class cancelled!
mt: Alipokuwa shuleni, aliona ishara inayosema kazi ilitoshe.
ref: Alipofika shuleni, akaona ishara iliyosema darasa limebatilishwa!

src: The branch holding the swing had broken and his daughter had fallen!
mt: Kifungu cha kipande cha kifua kilikuwa chafukuzi na binti yake alikuwa amekatika!
ref: Tawi lililoshikilia bembea lilikuwa limevunjika na binti yake alikuwa ameanguka!

src: They finally decided to close their tab.
mt: Wakati wote wakapata kujua kuacha.
ref: Mwishowe waliamua kufunga kichupo chao.

src: I used big words and tried to sound smart.
mt: Nilivyotumia maneno mengi na kujitambua.
ref: Nilitumia maneno makubwa na kujaribu kusikika mwerevu.

src: They took Nate to the doctor, who told them no medicine.
mt: Walimwambia Nate daktari, ambaye alisema hakuna dawa.
ref: Walimpeleka Nate kwa daktari, ambaye aliwaambia haitaji dawa.

src: One day she tried to go there and found out they closed down.
mt: Juma moja alikuwa anataka kufika huko na kufika kwenye magazeti yalikuwa yamefungwa.
ref: Siku moja alijaribu kwenda huko na akagundua wamefunga.

src: I hurried home.
mt: Nilimwacha nyumbani.
ref: Nilirudi nyumbani haraka.

src: He looked all over his home.
mt: Alisoma kwa kila kitu chake.
ref: Alitafuta kila mahali nyumbani kwake.

src: Fred rode the fastest and scariest roller coaster at the park!
mt: Fred aliruka kwa roller coaster aliyokuwa na nafasi na kasi zaidi katika mazingira ya parki!
ref: Fred alipanda treni ya burudani kasi na ya kutisha zaidi kwenye bustani!

src: She complained to the company promptly.
mt: Aliwataka kampuni kwa kipindi cha kwanza.
ref: Alilalamika kwa kampuni hiyo mara moja.

src: Jackson found that he loved the taste of beer.
mt: Jackson alijua kuwa anapenda kuona ngozi ya bia.
ref: Jackson akagundua kuwa anapenda ladha ya bia.

src: Unfortunately, the fly saw him coming and buzzed away.
mt: Kwa hakika, ndege aliingia kwa macho na ndege alimwaga.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, nzi huyo alimwona akija na akaruka.

src: His mom was proud.
mt: Mama yake alikuwa na furaha.
ref: Mama yake alijivunia.

src: I began to slowly walk backwards.
mt: Nilianza kuwinda kwa kasi.
ref: Nilianza kutembea polepole kurudi nyuma.

src: In less than a year, he was out of money completely.
mt: Kati ya miezi sita, alibaki bila pesa kabisa.
ref: Katika kipindi kisichozidi mwaka, alikuwa amepungukiwa na pesa kabisa.

src: I explained to her the fact that I used to be a leukemia patient.
mt: Nilimwuliza kwamba nilikuwa mgonjwa wa saratani ya damu.
ref: Nilimuelezea ukweli kwamba nilikuwa mgonjwa wa lukemia.

src: Matthew's mother relented and abandoned her work.
mt: Mama ya Matthew alikubali na kuacha kazi yake.
ref: Mama ya Matthew alitulia na kuacha kazi yake.

src: She rose early every morning to run for miles.
mt: Alijifungua kila mchana kwanza kwa ajili ya kufanya mabwawa kwa kilomita.
ref: Aliamka mapema kila asubuhi kukimbia kwa maili kadhaa.

src: Finally, I saw something moving in the dark.
mt: Kisha, niliona kitu kimeanza kuchipuka katika kati.
ref: Hatimaye, nikaona kitu kinachotembea gizani.

src: Needles were now stuck in Jack's pants.
mt: Zimamoto zimepaa kwa kanzu za Jack.
ref: Miba ilikwama kwenye suruali ya Jack.

src: They stopped and talked to him for awhile.
mt: Wakakata na kujadili naye kwa muda.
ref: Walisimama na kuzungumza naye kwa muda.

src: Riley agreed to make herself over.
mt: Riley akubali kufanya kipindi chake cha kwanza.
ref: Riley alikubali kubadilisha mavazi yake.

src: She is deeply traumatized by it.
mt: Anamwaga kwa kasi kwa hilo.
ref: Alihuzunishwa sana na tukio hilo.

src: To her shock, she won the contest.
mt: Kwa haba, alishinda mashindano hayo.
ref: Kwa mshtuko, alishinda mashindano.

src: He went around dusting the entire house.
mt: Alifika kwa kuchimba nyumba yote.
ref: Alizunguka nyumba nzima akisafisha.

src: Anna was crushed and her leg was broken.
mt: Anna alikwamishwa na mkono wake ulipigwa na moto.
ref: Anna alipondwa na mguu wake ukavunjika.

src: The sky was full of black storm clouds.
mt: Angani ilikuwa na mawimbi ya mawingu ya kijivu.
ref: Anga lilikuwa limejaa mawingu meusi ya dhoruba.

src: He and Kim started shopping for a new, bigger home.
mt: Alifika na Kimu kufika kwa nyumba mpya na kubwa zaidi.
ref: Yeye na Kim walianza kununua nyumba mpya na kubwa.

src: I asked people to vote for Cover A or Cover B.
mt: Nilimwambia watu kuchagua Cover A au Cover B.
ref: Niliomba watu wapigie kura ya Jalada A au Jalada B.

src: It the post is not made of sisal she will reject it.
mt: Kama posti hauwezi kutengenezwa kwa sisal, atalazimisha.
ref: Ikiwa kihimili hilo cha kitanda hakijatengenezwa na mkonge atalikataa.

src: The building and gaining was too slow for Daniel to succeed.
mt: Kuendesha na kupata kwa kiasi kikubwa kulikuwa na wingi kwa Daniel kufaulu.
ref: Utengenezaji na umaarufu ulikuwa polepole sana kwa Daniel kufanikiwa.

src: Two guards were approaching him.
mt: Wawakilishi wawili wakipanda.
ref: Walinzi wawili walikuwa wanamkaribia.

src: We fell asleep counting the stars in the sky.
mt: Tulipata nchi kwa kuangalia nyota za anga.
ref: Tulilala tukihesabu nyota angani.

src: I took several of the items and went to the checkout.
mt: Nilichukua nyingi za vitu hivyo na nikasafirishia kwenye kambi.
ref: Nilichukua bidhaa kadhaa na nikaenda kwenye sehemu ya malipo.

src: She had a hard time finding work but gave job searching her all.
mt: Aliwaona kazi kwa wingi lakini alifanya kazi yake kwa kila upana.
ref: Alipata wakati mgumu kupata kazi lakini akajitolea kabisa kutafuta kazi.

src: He was able to make new friends.
mt: Alifanya uhusiano na wenzake waboni.
ref: Aliweza kupata marafiki wapya.

src: She went to a class and breathed and focused.
mt: Alienda kwa kushika kazi na kupuliza na kufikiria.
ref: Alienda darasani na akapumua na akaweka fokasi.

src: She ate the greasy, fatty food with relish.
mt: Aliwachemsha chakula kipindu cha chumvi na chakula cha chumvi.
ref: Alikula chakula chenye mafuta akiwa na raha.

src: By the end of the day, she was feeling better.
mt: Kisha mchana, alikuwa na afya bora.
ref: Mwishoni mwa siku, alikuwa anahisi vizuri.

src: They finished the hike and were at the top.
mt: Wakati wao wakamilisha hiki chini na wakawa juu.
ref: Walimaliza kupanda mlima na wakafika juu.

src: I turned on the TV and a tornado warning came on!
mt: Nilimwambia TV na kufika habari ya uasi wa tufani!
ref: Nikawasha televisheni na onyo la kimbunga likaonyeshwa!

src: I went to the store the other day and bought what I needed.
mt: Nilipokwenda duka nyingine juzi na kupata yale yalivyotarajia.
ref: Nilienda dukani hivi majuzi nikanunua kile nilichohitaji.

src: Her friends and family told her it was crazy to leave school.
mt: Wanafunzi na familia yake walimwambia kwamba ni dhaifu kwa kujiongezea shule.
ref: Rafiki na familia yake walimwambia ilikuwa wazo mbaya kuacha shule.

src: She saw the movie with friends and had a great time.
mt: Aliangalia filamu na wenzake na alikuwa na muda mzuri.
ref: Akatazama sinema na marafiki na walikuwa na wakati mzuri.

src: They went to the woods and hiked for hours.
mt: Wakati wa kufika kwenye mashamba na kuharibu kwa saa nyingi.
ref: Wakaenda msituni na kutembea kwa saa kadhaa.

src: The developer asked him how tall to build the tower.
mt: Mwakilishi alimwuliza kwa umri gani kujenga barabara.
ref: Mwendelezaji alimwuliza urefu wa kujenga mnara huo.

src: She has the picture developed and sends each sister a copy.
mt: Anatunza picha na kutoa kila shujaa nusu ya picha.
ref: Picha hiyo ilitolewa na akatumia kila dada nakala.

src: She was getting frantic as she searched the house for him.
mt: Alikaa kama alikuwa na shida wakati wa kufika kwa nyumba kwa kumtazama.
ref: Akajawa na wasiwasi akimtafuta kwa nyumba.

src: He was given a speeding ticket.
mt: Alipewa tiketi ya kubeba.
ref: Alipewa tikiti ya mwendo wa kasi.

src: It was terribly hard to play the flute.
mt: Kutapika kwa ngoma ilikuwa kama kuchukua kifua.
ref: Ikawa ngumu sana kupiga filimbi.

src: Even his son was a fussy fruit eater!
mt: Japo mwanawe alikuwa anapenda vyakula vya matunda!
ref: Hata mtoto wake alikuwa mlaji mbaya wa matunda!

src: He started to scream and cry.
mt: Alianza kuchimba na kuchimba.
ref: Akaanza kupiga mayowe na kulia.

src: Finally it was the day of the big game.
mt: Kwisha kufika siku ya mchezo mkubwa.
ref: Hatimaye ilikuwa siku ya mchezo mkubwa.

src: Everyone started to practice and work much harder.
mt: Wote wakapanga na kufanya kazi zaidi.
ref: Kila mtu akaanza kufanya mazoezi na kufanya kazi kwa bidii zaidi.

src: Her brother was nervous for her and took her to a therapist.
mt: Kaka yake alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu yeye na akamleta kwa daktari.
ref: Ndugu yake alikuwa na wasiwasi kwa ajili yake na akampeleka kwa mtaalamu wa matibabu.

src: Then he used his nature guide to identify the plant.
mt: Baadaye alitumia kifanyaji kazi cha kudhibiti nchi kwa kudhibiti mchakini.
ref: Kisha akatumia mwongozo wake wa maumbile kutambua mmea huo.

src: Blue Belle ice cream arrived at Kroger last week.

ref: Wakaondoka wakikimbia nje, na kufikia gari la aiskrimu.

src: After purchasing a cheap ticket, we headed to the airport.

src: Susan was very pleased at the sight of them.

src: I should have been asleep hours ago.

src: When he got home, he took his family to see a movie and have dinner.

ref: Alipofika nyumbani, alipeleka familia yake kutazama filamu na kula chakula cha jioni.

src: The man was knocked out, and his co workers ran to help him.
mt: Kiumbe huyo alipigwa na kufa, na wafanyabiashara wake wakafika kumshirikiana.
ref: Mwanaume huo alipoteza fahamu, na wafanyakazi wake wenza wakakimbia kumsaidia.

src: This summer Trent was in charge of keeping the fire going in the wind.
mt: Kama ilivyokuwa katika majuma ya kesho Trent alikuwa amepanga moto kwenye anga.
ref: Majira haya ya joto ilikuwa ni zamu ya Trent kuwasha moto.

src: His TV had been stolen.
mt: TV yake ilipotea.
ref: TV yake ilikuwa imeibiwa.

src: His parents thought it was stupid.
mt: Wazazi wake walimwamini kama kitoto.
ref: Wazazi wake walifikiria ni ujinga.

src: Since he had the day off work, Cameron said he could help.
mt: Kwa sababu alikuwa na siku ya kazi, Cameron alisema alikuwa na nafasi ya kutusaidia.
ref: Kwa kuwa hakuwa akifanya kazi siku hiyo, Cameron alisema anaweza kusaidia.

src: He looked all over but couldn't find them.
mt: Alisoma kila mahali lakini hakutambua.
ref: Alitafuta kila mahali lakini hakuweza kuzipata.

src: Sara was in labor for 4 hours.
mt: Sara alikuwa katika kazi ya kujifungua kwa masaa 4.
ref: Sara alipitia uchungu wa kuzaa kwa saa 4.

src: It was worth a few hundred dollars.
mt: Ilivyopatikana, ilikuwa na thamani ya kati ya dola 100.
ref: Ilikuwa na thamani ya dola mia chache.

src: Instead, we biked through Golden Gate Park to the beach and the zoo.
mt: Kwa hiyo, tulipiga kwa magari kwa mazingira ya Mfereji wa Golden Gate hadi pwani na bado.
ref: Badala yake, tuliendesha baisikeli kwenda Golden Gate Park hadi ufuoni na bustani ya wanyama.

src: By the time she had her food, they were already done eating.
mt: Kabla ya kufika na chakula, wao walikuwa wamechakula.
ref: Kufikia wakati alipopata chakula chake, walikuwa tayari wamemaliza kula.

src: They played with her and rubbed her belly.
mt: Walicheza naye na kuchimba miguu yake.
ref: Walicheza na yeye na kusugua tumbo lake.

src: He got dressed and went to the church.
mt: Alivaa na kujikuta katika kanisa.
ref: Akavaa nguo na kwenda kanisani.

src: Zeke decided to build a house on that land.
mt: Zeke alikataa kujenga nyumba kwenye ardhi hiyo.
ref: Zeke akaamua kujenga nyumba kwenye ardhi hiyo.

src: She filled it out and submitted it.
mt: Aliwakilisha na kufanya.
ref: Aliyakamilisha na kuyawasilisha.

src: She got her food and went outside.
mt: Aliipata chakula chake na kufika nje.
ref: Akachukua chakula chake na kwenda nje.

src: The plane made a lot of loud noises but it wasn't too bad.
mt: Jengo liliwakuta kwa saa nyingi za sauti lakini hakuwa mbaya sana.
ref: Ndege hiyo ilikuwa na kelele nyingi lakini haikuwa mbaya sana.

src: He was so excited to receive it.
mt: Alikuwa na furaha kubwa kutokana na kupata kitu hicho.
ref: Alisisimka sana kuipokea.

src: Beth did the same with her parents and got some extra money too.
mt: Beth alifanya hivyo na wazazi wake na kupata pesa nyingi zaidi pia.
ref: Beth alifanya hivyo pia na wazazi wake na akapata pesa za ziada pia.

src: She gave up and ordered another pair.
mt: Aliacha na akatuma juma nyingine.
ref: Alikata tamaa na kuagiza sapatu zingine.

src: He visited three museums in just one day!
mt: Alifika katika vituo vitatu vya makumbusho katika siku moja tu!
ref: Alitembea makavazi tatu kwa siku moja!

src: On her graduation day, Jessica's father surprised her with tickets.
mt: Jana, siku ya kuhitimu, baba yake alimshambulia Jessica na tiketi.
ref: Siku yake ya kuhitimu, baba ya Jessica alimshutukiza kwa tikiti.

src: Then he decided to cut his jeans into shorts.
mt: Baadaye aliamua kuchoma jeans zake kwa kifungua.
ref: Kisha akaamu kukata jinzi yake ili iwe kaptula.

src: Her friend Jim wanted her old bed.
mt: Rafiki yake Jim alitaka kitabu chake cha zamani.
ref: Rafiki yake Jim alitaka kitanda chake cha zamani.

src: Instead of going to class, I went to the library and did exactly that.

ref: Badala ya kwenda darasani, nilienda kwenye maktaba na kufanya hivyo.

src: Timmy realized he had been caught, and was not sure what to do.
mt: Timmy alijua kuwa alikuwa ameipata, na hakuwa na uhakika wa kufanya nini.
ref: Timmy akagundua alikuwa amepatikana, na hakuwa na uhakika cha kufanya.

src: They were so huge and ornate!
mt: Walikuwa kama vile kubwa na kubwa!
ref: Zilikuwa kubwa na maridadi!

src: She was in a panic but her mother said they could fix it.
mt: Alikuwa katika hofu lakini mama yake alisema waweza kujenga.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi lakini mama yake akasema ataitatua.

src: When he woke up the next morning the room was filled with light.
mt: Alipokwama jioni jioni, chumba kilikuwa kimejaa nuru.
ref: Alipoamka asubuhi chumba kilikuwa kimejaa mwangaza.

src: She tried to tell that their office jobs were a whole lot worse.
mt: Alivyokuwa anavyotaka kuwafundisha kwamba kazi zao za ofisi zilikuwa zaidi za kushindwa.
ref: Akajaribu kuwambia kwamba kazi zao za ofisi zilikuwa mbaya zaidi.

src: His alarm hadn't gone off.
mt: Alitaka kufika kwa saa, lakini alarm yake haikuwa imeingia.
ref: Kengele yake haikuwa imelia.

src: The police didn't buy her story and arrested her.
mt: Polisi hawakubali kauli yake na kumuachia.
ref: Polisi hawakushawishiwa na hadithi yake na wakamkamata.

src: After 48 hours of being in labor, her baby was released.
mt: Baada ya miezi 48 ya kujitikisa, mtoto wake aliruhusu.
ref: Baada ya saa 48 za uchungu wa kuzaa, mtoto wake alizaliwa.

src: We fell in love with a cute black kitten.
mt: Waliokupenda kwa picha ni kisu chenye rangi ya kijivu.
ref: Tulipenda paka mchanga mrembo mweusi.

src: So he was proud when he came home with an A on his spelling homework.
mt: Kwa hivyo alikuwa na furaha wakati akiingia nyumbani na A kwenye kazi yake ya kusoma.
ref: Kwa hivyo alijivunia wakati alikuja nyumbani na A kwenye kazi yake ya nyumbani ya tahajia.

src: They went and looked at the apartments they had chosen.
mt: Wakati wao wakapanda, wakapanda kwa kuzingatia nyumba zao.
ref: Walienda na kuangalia ghorofa hizo walizochagua.

src: When the day of the party came, no one showed up.
mt: Jana la kufanya kikao, hakuna mtu aliyekuwa anashiriki.
ref: Wakati siku ya sherehe ilipofika, hakuna mtu aliyekuja.

src: Thankfully, the wedding day dawned clear and sunny after all.
mt: Kwa bahati zake, siku ya ndoa ilipofika ilikuwa ya jua na baridi kwa kila aina.
ref: Kwa uzuri, siku ya harusi ilikuwa haina mawingu na yenye jua.

src: He told her she would receive everything she wanted.
mt: Alimwambia anayemwita yeye atapata yote anayotaka.
ref: Alimwambia atapokea kila kitu alichokitaka.

src: She picked them one by one.
mt: Aliwapa wakati mmoja kwa mmoja.
ref: Alizichukua moja baada ya nyingine.

src: Each time she had the toothbrush she would drop it.
mt: Kila mara alipokuwa na kisagaji alikuwa anapindua.
ref: Kila wakati aliposhika mswaki huo angeuangusha.

src: Hannah could not get her fingers to work properly.
mt: Hannah hakutaki kufanya kazi kwa miguu yake kwa kipindi kikubwa.
ref: Hannah hangeweza kufanya vidole vyake vifanya kazi vizuri.

src: And then he hit her because she burned dinner.
mt: Na kisha akamwita kwa sababu aliwachoma chakula.
ref: Na kisha akampiga kwa sababu aliunguza chakula cha jioni.

src: The sheep moved together into the pen.
mt: Kambili ziliingia kwa pumbazi pamoja.
ref: Kondoo walienda pamoja ndani ya zizi.

src: Walter had a vivid dream in which his late wife reassured him.
mt: Walter alikuwa na kipindi cha kujisikia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia
ref: Walter alikuwa na ndogo dhahiri ambapo marehemu mke wake alimtia moyo.

src: She looked down towards her legs but became disoriented.
mt: Aliangalia chini kuelekea kwa vipepeo vyake lakini alikuwa na uwezo mdogo.
ref: Akaangalia chini kuelekea miguu yake na akapoteza mwelekeo.

src: I prayed nervously as the winning numbers were drawn.
mt: Nilimwomba kwa nguvu wakati waliwakilisha kibali cha kile kilichoshinda.
ref: Niliomba kwa wasiwasi huku nambari za ushindi zikichaguliwa.

src: She wrote a song about it to memorize the material more easily.
mt: Aliandika nyimbo juu yake ili kujifunza zaidi.
ref: Aliandika wimbo kuihusu ili kukariri nyenzo hizo kwa urahisi zaidi.

src: However, a congratulatory text from my parents cheered me up.
mt: Lakini barua pepe ya kuwahimiza kutoka kwa wazazi wangu kujivunia.
ref: Hata hivyo, ujumbe wa heko kutoka kwa wazazi wangu ulinichangamsha.

src: Then, they played with some trucks.
mt: Baadaye, waliwinda na vikundi vya magari.
ref: Kisha, walicheza na magari.

src: They paid for the bill and left.
mt: Wakapata faini na kuondoka.
ref: Wakalipa bili na kuondoka.

src: There was no enough room for Kay's things.
mt: Kuna mahali pa kutosha kwa vitu vya Kay.
ref: Kulikuwa na chumba cha kutosha kwa vitu vya Kay.

src: The staff had to throw them out.
mt: Watumiaji wakafurudia.
ref: Ilibidi wafanyakazi wawaondoe.

src: One day Vinny saw Denzel Washington out taking a stroll.
mt: Vinny mmoja alipata Denzel Washington akiwa ananyanyasana.
ref: Siku moja Vinny alimwona Denzel Washington akitembea.

src: I thought I was going to drown!
mt: Nilimwambia nimekuwa na wakati wa kufa!
ref: Nilidhania nitazama!

src: Then they noticed her looking down at them from the top branches.
mt: Baadaye wakajua anayemwona wakiwa wameangalia chini kwa mabawa.
ref: Kisha wakamwona akiwaangalia kutoka juu ya matawi.

src: She got a job as a tutor and had a lot of great adventures.
mt: Aliweza kupata kazi kama mwalimu na alikuwa na mashabiki mengi ya matukio mema.
ref: Alipata kazi kama mwalimu na kufurahia jasura za ajabu.

src: Eventually a really bad smell took over her apartment.
mt: Kwa hatua moja, kipinduzi kizito kimechukua nyumba yake.
ref: Mwishowe harufu mbaya sana ikajaa nyumba yake.

src: Ted decided there was no better time to learn, so he jumped in.
mt: Ted aliamua hakuna wakati bora zaidi ya kujifunza, hivyo akajikuta katika kipindi hicho.
ref: Ted akaamua hakukuwa na wakati mwingine mzuri wa kujifunza, kwa hivyo akaruka ndani.

src: We went to dinner and then a movie.
mt: Tulipokwenda kwa chakula na baadaye kwa sinema.
ref: Tulienda kwa chakula cha jioni na kisha sinema.

src: We finally found the sloths in the very last exhibit.
mt: Kwa mara ya kwanza tukapata kipenzi kwenye mazingira ya mwisho.
ref: Mwishowe tukapata slothi katika onyesho la mwisho kabisa.

src: Several weeks go by and they manage to develop a cure.
mt: Kutokana na muda mrefu, wamejenga dawa.
ref: Wiki chache zikapita na wakaweza kutengeneza tiba.

src: Sam's dad made them a snack of apples and caramel sauce.
mt: Baba wa Sam alimwagilia wakati wa chakula cha mafuta ya tunda na mafuta ya karamel.
ref: Baba ya Sam aliwatengenezea vitafunio vya tofaa na sosi ya karameli.

src: In two months she had lost 23 pounds.
mt: Katika miezi miwili alikuwa amepoteza kilo 23.
ref: Kwa miezi miwili alipoteza pauni 23.

src: India then grabbed the milk and ice for the beverage.
mt: India kisha kuchukua maziwa na barafu kwa bidhaa hiyo.
ref: Kisha India akachukua maziwa na barafu kwa ajili ya kinywaji.

src: Her mom had gotten her a pet after all!
mt: Mama yake alimwambia kama yupo!
ref: Kwani mama yake alikuwa amemnunulia mnyama kipenzi!

src: However, she continues until she has her degree.
mt: Lakini, anavyoendelea hadi anapata shahada yake.
ref: Hata hivyo, aliendelea hadi akapata shahada yake.

src: After finishing the course, Cornelia built a beautiful table.
mt: Baada ya kufikia mwisho wa kipindi, Cornelia alibuni meza ya kufaa.
ref: Baada ya kumaliza kozi hiyo, Cornelia alitengeneza meza maridadi.

src: They became scared and ran.
mt: Wakawa na wasiwasi na kufika.
ref: Wakaogopa na kutoroka.

src: They raced each other for seven miles.
mt: Waliwinda kwa saba mile.
ref: Wakashindana mbio kwa maili saba.

src: Sally loves robins.
mt: Sally anapenda wadudu.
ref: Sally anapenda ndege.

src: She beat him by 18 points!
mt: Aliwachia kwa 18 point!
ref: Alimshinda kwa alama 18!

src: We were amazed how quickly he chopped and didn't get cut.
mt: Tulikuwa na hofu kama atakapokatwa wakati wa kuchopwa.
ref: Tulishangazwa na jinsi alivyokata kwa haraka na hakujikata.

src: She colored on the walls.
mt: Aliyachanganya katika kivuli.
ref: Akapaka rangi kuta.

src: I walked for miles searching for my friends.
mt: Nilipita kwa mila zangu kujifungua kwa wenzangu.
ref: Nilitembea maili kadhaa nikiwatafuta marafiki wangu.

src: She asked her teacher if she could borrow her's for the day.
mt: Aliwataka mwalimu kama anaweza kutupa yake kwa siku moja.
ref: Akamwomba mwalimu wake kama anaweza kuazima zake kwa siku hiyo.

ref: Mtaalamu akamwambia ilikuwa ni pete ya zamani kutoka enzi za zamani.

src: Both of them got horrible stomach aches.
mt: Wote wawili wakapata matatizo makubwa ya mifupa.
ref: Wote hao walipata maumivu mabaya ya tumbo.

src: Bob was dehydrated from exerting himself.
mt: Bob alikuwa na uhaba wa maji kutokana na kushindana nafasi.
ref: Bob hakuwa na maji mwilini kutokana na jitihada zake.

src: Kathy cried on the way home.
mt: Kathy alikimbia nyumbani.
ref: Kathy alilia njiani kwenda nyumbani.

src: As soon as the school year started he signed up for the team.
mt: Baada ya mwaka wa shule kuanza alisainiwa kwa timu.
ref: Punde tu mwaka wa masomo ulipoanza akajiunga na timu.

src: I felt like I was going to die.
mt: Nilikuwa nimejua kuwa nimekuwa na kifo.
ref: Nilihisi ni kama nitakufa.

src: She posted it online for everyone to see.
mt: Aliweka kwenye mtandao kwa wote kuona.
ref: Aliichapisha mtandaoni ili kila mtu aone.

src: Finally he was a great boxer.
mt: Kwa sasa alikuwa mshambuliaji mkubwa.
ref: Mwishowe akawa mwanadondia mzuri.

src: We enjoyed pizza and story time after swimming.
mt: Kwetu tulipenda pizza na muda wa kufundisha baada ya kupiga kwa maji.
ref: Tulifurahia piza na muda wa hadithi baaada ya kuogelea.

src: Tom and everyone else around him got a bit uncomfortable.
mt: Tom na wote wengine wakati wa kufanya hivyo wakakosea.
ref: Tom na kila mtu karibu na yeye wakaanza kuhisi wasiwasi.

src: Allie dieted hard and exercised.
mt: Allie alikuwa anafanya kazi kwa kula chakula kipindu na kufanya mazoezi.
ref: Allie alikula vizuri na kufanya mazoezi kwa bidii.

src: Jenny heard a horn honk and saw she was on the wrong side of the road.
mt: Jenny alikuta kichwa cha gari kikimkia na kufika kwamba alikuwa kwenye nchi mbaya ya barabara.
ref: Jenny alisikia honi na kuona alikuwa upande mbaya wa barabara.

src: Every month Elle paid five hundred dollars towards the car's price.
mt: Kila mwezi Elle alipata pesa elfu moja kwa kipindi cha gari hilo.
ref: Kila mwezi Elle alilipa dola mia tano kuelekea kulipa bei ya gari.

src: But the mechanic gave him some good news.
mt: Lakini mchakachuaji alimwambia habari nzuri.
ref: Lakini mekanika akampa habari nzuri.

src: He called the local wildlife rescue and reported the baby possums.
mt: Alipiga simu kwa wakala wa wanyama wa kijiji na kutoa habari za kipenzi.
ref: Akawaita waokoaji wa wanyama pori na kuripoti vifaurongo hai wadogo.

src: Don's shame and embarrassment grew.
mt: Don's hofu na hofu yake iliongezea.
ref: Aibu na fedheha ya Don ikakua zaidi.

src: Suddenly, my neighbor called me from next door.
mt: Kisha, jirani yangu alimwambia kutoka kwa jirani.
ref: Ghafla, jirani yangu aliniita kutoka mlango uliofuata.

src: Five Years later, we married.
mt: Tano miaka baadaye, tulimwona.
ref: Miaka mitano baadaye, tukafunga ndoa.

src: So when received the bowl from the waitress, she hurt her hands.
mt: Kwa hiyo wakati wa kupata chakula kutoka kwa mwenyeji, alivuruga mikono yake.
ref: Kwa hivyo alipopokea bakuli kutoka kwa mhudumu, aliumiza mikono yake.

src: She finds that she loves backstroke and doesn't get water in her ears.
mt: Anavyoona kwamba anapenda kwa kushindwa na hata hakuna maji katika miguu yake.
ref: Akagundua kuwa anapenda kuogelea kinyumenyume na maji hayaingii masikioni mwake.

src: I chose an awesome little shop and sat down for lunch.
mt: Nilichagua duka la kujisalimisha na kupata chakula cha mchana.
ref: Nikachagua duka dogo nzuri na nikakaa kula chakula cha mchana.

src: No one was looking so she lowered it towards the dog.
mt: Hakuna mtu aliyemwona hivyo aliloweka chini kwa mbwa.
ref: Hakuna mtu aliyekuwa akiangalia kwa hivyo alishusha kuelekea mbwa.

src: We enjoyed TEN courses over four hours.
mt: Tulipenda KATENI kwa muda wa NNE masaa.
ref: Tulifurahiya sehemu KUMI za mlo kwa zaidi ya saa nne.

src: The first night was scary, as he heard howls and much rustling.
mt: Alipokuwa kwanza, alikuwa na wasiwasi, kwa sababu alikuta kuchimba na kuchimba sana.
ref: Usiku wa kwanza ulikuwa wa kutisha, kwani alisikia milio kali na mrudiorudio wa sauti hii.

src: His neighbor came over and helped him get his car running.
mt: Jirani yake alipita na kumshirikiana kumwajibika gari yake.
ref: Jirani yake akakuja kumsaidia kuwasha gari lake.

src: She had earned enough miles to pay for her ticket!
mt: Aliweza kupata miles kwa wingi kwa kufanya kazi, na kwa hiyo aliweza kupata tiketi ya ndege.
ref: Alikuwa amepata maili ya kutosha ya kulipia tikiti yake!

src: I helped her rewrite her resume, preparing for a job search.
mt: Nilimshirikisha kurekebisha CV yake, kwa kuwakaribisha kufanya uchaguzi wa kazi.
ref: Nikamsaidia kuandika upya wasifu wake, ili kujiandaa kutafuta kazi.

src: Nita played hard and well, and she won!
mt: Nita alicheza kwa nguvu na kwa kipaji, na alishinda!
ref: Nita akacheza kwa bidii na vizuri, na akashinda!

src: Thankfully she did great.
mt: Naam, alikuwa bora sana.
ref: Hata hivyo alifanya vizuri.

src: Neil was impressed by the obvious labor of love.
mt: Neil alikuwa na wasiwasi kwa ajili ya kazi ya upendo iliyotambuliwa.
ref: Neil akavutiwa na kazi dhahiri ya upendo.

src: But then the saturated ball accidentally hit Mark's mother!
mt: Lakini baadaye mabega yaliyosogezwa yalipata kufika kwa mama yake!
ref: Lakini basi mpira uliokolezwa kwa bahati mbaya ukampiga mama ya Mark!

src: At breakfast the next morning, he met Bill.
mt: Jana alipokuwa akifanya chakula cha asubuhi, alijadili na Bill.
ref: Katika kiamsha kinywa asubuhi iliyofuata, akakutana na Bill.

src: Vince got 10 ounces of frozen yogurt.
mt: Vince alipata 10 ounces ya yogurt ya baridi.
ref: Vince alipata ounsi 10 za mtindi uliogandishwa.

src: The team watched him play and they cheered.
mt: Wakundi wakaripoti kwake kucheza na wao wakaripoti.
ref: Timu ikamtazama akicheza na walishangilia.

src: Buck, intrigued, went to the shelter right away.
mt: Buck, alivutwa, alipofika katika chumba cha kujitolea kwa kwanza.
ref: Buck, akavutiwa, na akaenda kwenye makazi mara moja.

src: It hurt very much.
mt: Nilikuwa na nguvu kubwa sana.
ref: Aliumia sana.

src: Even a long shot was worth it.
mt: Kama ni mshahara, ni wakati.
ref: Hata bahati nasibu ilistahili.

src: Finally Fred worked up the courage to ask her on a date.
mt: Kwa sasa Fred alijaribu kujua nia yake kwa kumtaka kwa kipigo.
ref: Mwishowe Fred alijipa ujasiri wa kumuuliza kwenda matembezi naye.

src: She grabs some cookies and heads towards the front of the store.
mt: Anapata maji ya kipande na kufika kwenye sehemu ya mbele ya duka.
ref: Akachukua biskuti na akaelekea mbele ya duka.

src: Bob and Jenny had a good time.
mt: Bob na Jenny walikuwa na muda mzuri.
ref: Bob na Jenny walikuwa na wakati mzuri.

src: my truck got really dirty.
mt: gari yangu yalikuwa na nguvu sana.
ref: lori langu lipata uchafu sana.

src: He felt thrilled to be there.
mt: Alifurahia kuwa huko.
ref: Alihisi amefurahi kuwa hapo.

src: Josh was happy that he got a bonus.
mt: Josh alikuwa na furaha kwa sababu alipata ajira ya kibao.
ref: Josh alifurahi kuwa amepata bonasi.

src: Soon he had one hundred views!
mt: Kwa muda mfupi alikuwa na zaidi ya miaka 100!
ref: Punde tu akakuwa na mionekano mia moja!

src: The man kindly said thank you before he walked away.
mt: Kijana alikuwa na furaha akasema asante kabla ya kufika.
ref: Mtu huyo kwa upole akasema asante kabla ya kuondoka.

src: The girls weren't sure where she could be.
mt: Wajawabu hawakuwa na uhakika wapi alipo.
ref: Wasichana hawakuwa na uhakika angeweza kuwa wapi.

src: She saw a huge, scary fish swimming in the water!
mt: Aliiona samaki mkubwa na kawaida.
ref: Aliona samaki mkubwa anayetisha akiogelea ndani ya maji!

src: His son's bike, though, fell apart after only a few weeks.
mt: Kabla hajakamilika wiki chache, pikipiki ya mtoto wake ilipata hatari.
ref: Hata hivyo, baiskeli ya mwanawe ilianguka baada ya wiki chache tu.

src: Jaime froze unable to speak.
mt: Jaime alikwama bila kusema.
ref: Jaime alisimama akashindwa kuongea.

src: Despite how scared he was he stayed the entire night.
mt: Alipojaa kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kujitahidi kwa kuj
ref: Licha ya jinsi alivyoogopa alikaa usiku mzima.

src: Then she fastened tiny diamond studs into the piercings.
mt: Baadaye alifunga mabwawa ya kizungu ya kipande kipande.
ref: Kisha akafunga vipuli vidogo vya almasi ndani ya shimo.

src: They admired the roses while they ate dinner.
mt: Waliadhimu mafungu wakati wao waliwa chakula.
ref: Walitazama na kupendezwa maua walipokuwa wakila chakula cha jioni.

src: They handcuffed me and walked me through the mall.
mt: Wakamkamua na kufuata kwa kipande kipande.
ref: Walinifunga pingu na wakanipitisha kwenye maduka.

src: Bottom of ninth, Matt was up at bat with two strikes to his name
mt: Kwa nusu ya nane, Matt alikuwa kwa kipindi cha kufanya michezo na michezo mawili kwa jina
ref: Chini ya tisa, Matt alikuwa ameongoza na mipigo miwili kwa jina lake

src: When she went outside she saw a brand new car.
mt: Alipokuwa nje aliona gari la kawaida.
ref: Alipotoka nje aliona gari mpya kabisa.

src: They seemed friendly and had similar interests.
mt: Walikuwa rafiki na wana mambo yoyote.
ref: Walionekana kuwa wenye urafiki na walikuwa na mapendeleo sawa.

src: He taught me how to cook and season a steak.
mt: Alimwombaji nini kuharisha na kuchapisha nyama ya ng'ombe.
ref: Akanifunza jinsi ya kupika na kukoleza steki.

src: After introducing him to my cat we decided to take him home.
mt: Baada ya kufundisha kwa kiti changu tulikubali kumwacha nyumbani.
ref: Baada ya kumtambulisha kwa paka wangu tukaamua kumpeleka nyumbani.

src: Tony baked the bread according to the recipe.
mt: Tony alitunza mkate kulingana na tarifa.
ref: Tony alioka mkate kulingana na maagizo ya mapishi.

src: She decided to go to the authorities.
mt: Aliamua kufika kwa wakati.
ref: Aliamua kwenda kwa mamlaka.

src: When he woke up this morning three were in the box, not four.
mt: Japo alipokwama leo tatu ndiyo ilikuwa katika kioo, si nne.
ref: Alipoamka asubuhi ya leo, tatu zilikuwa ndani ya kisanduku, sio nne.

src: His mother heard him from in the kitchen and ran over to him.
mt: Mama yake alikuta akisikia kutoka katika chumba cha kuchoma na kufika kwake.
ref: Mama yake alimsikia akiwa jikoni na akamkimbilia.

src: But he was too exhausted to try to catch the fly.
mt: Alikaa kwa sababu alikuwa na uwezo mdogo wa kujaribu kuchoma maboko.
ref: Lakini alikuwa amechoka sana kujaribu kumshika nzi huyo.

src: Eventually we pretty much stopped playing and just hung out.
mt: Kwa hatia hatuendelea kucheza na tu tukae.
ref: Mwishowe tuliacha kucheza na tukabarizi tu.

src: The neighbors called the cops.
mt: Wazalendo waliwaua polisi.
ref: Majirani wakaita polisi.

src: They invited everyone to come see it.
mt: Waliwajibisha wote kufika kuona.
ref: Walialika kila mtu aje kuiona.

src: A kind man sat next to him and offered him advice.
mt: Kijamaa mmoja alikuwa karibu naye na kutoa mawazo.
ref: Mtu mkarimu alikaa karibu naye na akampa ushauri.

src: She cried and cried until her parents caved.
mt: Aliwatawala na watawala mpaka wazazi wakapata.
ref: Akalia na kulia hadi wazazi wake wakasalimu.

src: She then began decorating the outside of the house.
mt: Alikaa kuchipua nje ya nyumba.
ref: Kisha akaanza kupamba nje ya nyumba.

src: When they finally did they were impressed by her dedication.

src: He was determined to win at all cost.
mt: Alitaka kushinda kwa kila ghala.

src: It was flat as a pancake!
mt: Imecheza kama kipande cha kawaida!
ref: Ilikuwa bapa kama chapati ya maji!

src: She buys a few gallons of cider before she leaves.
mt: Anapokwenda, anachukua kifaa cha kutosha cha cider.
ref: Akanunua galoni chache za sida kabla ya kuondoka.

src: When he woke up the next day school was cancelled.
mt: Japo alipokwama siku iliyofuata shule ilikuwa imechukuliwa.
ref: Alipoamka siku iliyofuata shule ilikuwa imebatilishwa.

src: He found them them early in the morning while they still slept.
mt: Alifika wakati wao waliokuwa wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati wao wao wakienda kwa wakati

src: She swats the wall with a piece of paper.
mt: Anasababisha kichwa cha kifua kikimwaga na kitabu.
ref: Akapiga ukuta na kipande cha karatasi.

src: Nick decided to give the wallet to the police station.
mt: Nick aliamua kupa timu ya polisi.
ref: Nick aliamua kupeleka mkoba huo kwa kituo cha polisi.

src: Soon he was learning lots of facts about the ocean and exploring.
mt: Kisha alikuwa anafundisha mengi kuhusu bahari na kufundisha.
ref: Punde tu alikuwa anajifunza ukweli kuhusu bahari na akichunguza.

src: I cried and held my girlfriend who was with me.
mt: Nilimwambia na kushika mpenzi wangu ambaye alikuwamo nami.
ref: Nililia na kumshika mpenzi wangu aliyekuwa nami.

src: To her shock, she still could not get the lily!
mt: Kwa haba, hawakupata lili!
ref: Kwa mshtuko wake, bado hakuweza kupata yungiyungi!

src: After going through all the steps, Brian tasted the pork chops.
mt: Baada ya kufika kwenye hatua zote, Brian alalipika nyama ya chupa.
ref: Baada ya kupitia hatua zote, Brian alionja vipande vya nyama ya nguruwe.

src: James had to run to his car in order to avoid the cold weather.
mt: James alitumia muda wake kwa kufika gari yake ili kuepuka hali ya hewa ya baridi.
ref: James alilazimika akimbie kwenye gari lake ili kuepuka hali ya hewa ya baridi.

src: She didn't want the principal to know she was relieved.
mt: Aliyekuwa mkuu alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Hakutaka mwalimu mkuu ajue alikuwa amefurahia.

src: Eventually Cole forgot about the incident.
mt: Kwa hatia Cole alikataa kuhusu kesi.
ref: Hatimaye Cole alisahau kuhusu tukio hilo.

src: Mike's finger landed on Hawaii.
mt: Mike's finger landed on Hawaii.
ref: Kidole cha Mike kilitua Hawaii.

src: Minutes later she smelled something horrible.
mt: Baada ya dakika chache aliona kitu kibaya.
ref: Dakika chache baadaye alihisi harufu mbaya.

src: The four of us had drinks in the lodge that night.
mt: Kwetu tatu tulikuwa na pikipiki katika nyumba ya kifungo jana.
ref: Sisi wanne tukanywa vinywaji katika chumba cha wageni kulala usiku huo.

ref: Alimpa dola tano kwa siku ili atumie muda fulani na paka.

src: They came by our house and denied everything.
mt: Wakati wakapita nyumbani yetu, wakadhalilisha kila kitu.
ref: Walikuja nyumbani kwetu na wakakana kila kitu.

src: However, a worm came out of the hole.
mt: Lakini, nyoka ilipatikana kwenye kimbunga.
ref: Walakini, minyoo ilitoka ndani ya shimo.

src: He waited a week and then picked it up from the shop.
mt: Alimwaga wiki moja na kisha kupata kutoka kwa duka.
ref: Alisubiri wiki moja kisha akalichukua kutoka kwenye duka.

src: She didn't have a single day where she didn't work late.
mt: Aliyekuwa na siku moja ambapo alikuwa hajafanya kazi za kutosha.
ref: Hakupata siku hata moja ambapo alifanya kazi akakosa kuchelewa.

src: He staggered to the nearest hospital.
mt: Alisimama kwa kujikuta kwenye hospitali ya karibu.
ref: Alijikongoja hadi hospitali iliyokuwa karibu.

src: The next day Fred saw that the rainy had ruined his new furniture.
mt: Jana Fred aliona kwamba mvua ilivyovuruga meza yake mpya.
ref: Siku iliyofuata Fred akaona kuwa mvua ilikuwa imeharibu fanicha yake mpya.

src: When he was done, Jordy looked thoughtfully at his creation.
mt: Baada ya kufikia, Jordy alimshangaa kwa kujifunza kwa kujenga.
ref: Alipomaliza, Jordy aliangalia uumbaji wake akifikiria.

src: He met with the professors and got extra tutoring.
mt: Alifika na wataalamu na kupata mafunzo ya kutosha.
ref: Akakutana na maprofesa na kupata mafunzo ya ziada.

src: He went to his van and looked it up in his database.
mt: Alingia katika gari lake na kuchunguza kwa kifichwa chake.
ref: Akaenda kwenye gari lake na kuliangalia kwenye hifadhidata yake.

src: Amy chose a bright red nail polish color.
mt: Amy alichagua rangi ya nail polish yenye rangi ya nyekundu.
ref: Amy alichagua rangi nyekundu ya kucha inayong'aa.

src: The boat was going fast and David started having fun!
mt: Chifuani kilikuwa kimeendelea na David kuanza kutafuta nafasi!
ref: Mashua ilikuwa ikienda haraka na David akaanza kufurahi!

src: She noticed that it was a half of a foot long.
mt: Alijua kwamba ilikuwa nusu ya futi.
ref: Aligundua kuwa ilikuwa nusu ya mguu mrefu.

src: Since I was extremely tired, I fell asleep completely.
mt: Kwa sababu nilikuwa na ulemavu sana, nilipata kujitupa kabisa.
ref: Kwa kuwa nilikuwa nimechoka sana, nililala kabisa.

src: Just being outside began to lift her low spirits.
mt: Kutokana na kujitokeza, kile kilichokaua roh yake kimepata kujitokeza.
ref: Kuwa nje tu kulianza kubadilisha hisia zake.

src: I didn't reapply sunscreen throughout the day.
mt: Nilisahau kutumia kisafarishi cha jua kwa siku nzima.
ref: Sikupaka tena mafuta ya kuzuia miale ya jua siku nzima.

src: After three weeks, Jane was juggling.
mt: Baada ya miezi mitatu, Jane alikuwa akijibiza.
ref: Baada ya wiki tatu, Jane alikuwa akighushi.

src: He didn't know what to do at first.
mt: Alidhani kwanza.
ref: Hakujua atakachofanya kwanza.

src: Betty wouldn't tell him which kind of milk she wanted.
mt: Betty hakuwajibika kwa kusema alichokitaka kwa aina gani.
ref: Betty hangemwambia ni aina gani ya maziwa aliyotaka.

src: When it was her turn she made sure to put her best acting to use.
mt: Kwao alipokuwa yake alifanya kazi yake kwa kujitahidi.
ref: Ilipofika zamu yake alihakikisha atatumia uigizaji wake mzuri.

src: Finally he notices that the dandruff is going away.

mt: Profesa alisema anaweza kufanya kipindi cha mwisho kwa siku nyingine.

mt: Baadaye Tom aliondoka kwa kushikwa na kujifungua.
ref: Baada ya muda Tom alitoka nje ya vivuli akicheka.

src: Barry decided he would go bowling on Saturday at the new location.
mt: Barry aliamua kufika kwenye bowling kwa siku ya Jumamosi katika mahali mpya.
ref: Barry akaamua ataenda kuvingirisha matufe Jumamosi katika eneo jipya.

src: Everyone enjoyed sandwiches, fruit and more.
mt: Wote walikuwa wakipenda sandwiczi, matunda na zaidi.
ref: Kila mtu alifurahia sandwichi, matunda na zaidi.

src: Allison accepted the invitation.
mt: Allison alipokea tekelezi.
ref: Allison alikubali mwaliko huo.

src: She attended college for journalism and made high marks.
mt: Alihudhuria chuo kwa habari na kufanya kile kile.
ref: Alienda chuo cha uandishi wa habari na kupata alama za juu.

src: They had popcorn and candy for dinner, with cookies for dessert.
mt: Walikula popcorn na chokaa kwa chakula, na cookies kwa chakula cha kesho.
ref: Wakakula bisi na pipi kwa chakula cha jioni, na biskuti kama kitindamlo.

src: They had a snowball fight.
mt: Walifanya mchezo wa kula mafuta ya barafu.

src: The phone ended up jumping out of my pocket.
mt: Simu ilipata kujikuta kwenye kitanda cha kichwa.
ref: Mwishowe simu yangu iliruka nje kutoka kwa mfuko wangu.

src: The snow always sounds and feels nice.
mt: Barafu hupendwa kila wakati.

src: Garry's coach found out about his failing grades, and spoke with him.

src: He couldn't keep up with all the women.
mt: Alikosa kufika kwa wanyonge wote.

mt: Aliingiza kwa miguu katika duka ili kupanga mpira mpya.

src: They all met up at a local lake and drank beer and swam.

src: Danny tried making it for himself.

src: She added the seasonings.

src: She got home and scratched it off.

mt: Kama ilivyokuwa, ilikuwa inakwenda kwa mshirika mwingine.
ref: Ulikuwa karibu kumwangukia mfanyakazi mwenza.

mt: Alipigwa kwa kipigo cha kifo cha kawaida.

mt: Alisema anamwambia alikuwa mrembo sana.

mt: Nilimwajibika na mamake mengi ya yale mema na waliokuwa na furaha.
ref: Nila alikuza kumbukumbu nyingi nzuri na mama yake na walikuwa na furaha.

mt: Na Jeff alikuwa na furaha kwamba alikuta hakuna kuchimba tena.
ref: Na jeff alifurahi kwamba hakusikia ubwekaji tena.

ref: Baadaye akagundua ndugu yake alikuwa ametengeneza muundo kwa kutumia mafuta hayo.

mt: Aliwapa viatu.

src: She is invited a lot of her friends from school.
mt: Anaitwa nyingi wenzake wote kutoka shule.
ref: Amewaalika marafiki wake wengi kutoka shuleni.

src: It was great making new friends.
mt: Nilikuwa na nafasi ya kuunda ndugu mpya.
ref: Ilikuwa vizuri kupata marafiki wapya.

src: I got home and made some snacks, then went to put the movie in.
mt: Nilipata nyumbani na kufanya chakula cha kifungua, nilikuwa nimefika kufanya filamu.
ref: Nikafika nyumbani na kutengeneza vitafunio kiasi, kisha nikaenda kuweka filamu hiyo.

src: Paula started delivering some spoken word.

ref: Paula alianza kusema maneno kadhaa yanayoambatanishwa.

src: In addition, he said that there was a call made to Jamaica.
mt: Kwa pamoja, alisema kwamba kuna simu iliyotolewa kwa Jamaika.
ref: Isitoshe, alisema kwamba kulikuwa na simu iliyopigwa kwenda Jamaica.

src: She opened presents and had cake.
mt: Aliwakuta na kula kwa kila aina.
ref: Alifungua zawadi na akala keki.

src: They couldn't understand why she would wear something different.
mt: Wakakosea kuelewa kwanini anavaiwa kitu tofauti.

src: He searched everywhere.

src: But then she realized she was lost.

src: Bending down, she picked up the shiny item.

ref: Akainama chini, akachukua kitu hicho kilichong'aa.

src: One of them offered him a drink.
mt: Moja wao alimpa kwa kupika.
ref: Mmoja wao akampatia kinywaji.

src: It wound up having 7 kittens.
mt: Kwa hakika ilikuwa na 7 kipanya.
ref: Alijifungua watoto 7 wa paka.

src: After several Years he cleaned up, and finances his own life.
mt: Baada ya miaka kadhaa alivyonunua, na kujitunza, na kujitunza maisha yake.
ref: Baada ya Miaka kadhaa alimaliza, na hugharamia maisha yake mwenyewe.

src: Eventually his neighbors do too and his neighborhood looks better.
mt: Kwa hatua yake wenyewe wanasema hivyo na kwa hatua yake wenyewe nchi yake inaonekana bora.
ref: Hatimaye majirani wake pia hufanya hivyo na mtaa wake unaonekana bora.

src: I got undressed.
mt: Nilipiga kichwa.
ref: Nikavua nguo.

src: He eventually came before night time.
mt: Alipofika kabla ya usiku.
ref: Hatimaye alikuja kabla ya usiku.

src: He decided to do cardio instead of lifting.
mt: Alisema atakapenda kufanya cardio badala ya kupanda.
ref: Aliamua kufanya mazoezi ya kuinua kasi mpigo wa moyo badala ya kuinua.

src: On her day off she hung out with boyfriend Rob
mt: Jana alikuwa na siku ya kwanza, alikuwa na mpenzi Rob
ref: Siku yake ya kupumzika alikuwa akibarizi na mpenzi Rob

src: Happiness became a foreign concept to Carl.
mt: Kutakata kwa Carl ilikuwa kifupi cha kujitakia.
ref: Furaha ikawa dhana ya kigeni kwa Carl.

src: Eddie secretly buried a pile of quarters in the sand.
mt: Eddie alisimama kwa bila shauku kwenye panga ya kumi kwa kumi katika majani.
ref: Eddie kwa siri akazika rundo la senti kwenye mchanga.

src: She accepted.
mt: Aliamua.
ref: Akakubali.

src: Kim reminded her it was the first day, and she would improve.
mt: Kim alimwambia yeye kwamba hilo lilikuwa siku ya kwanza, na alikuwa atakapotoa.
ref: Kim akamkumbusha kuwa ilikuwa siku ya kwanza, na ataendelea kuwa bora.

src: But when she rushed out of the shower to answer, no one was there.
mt: Lakini wakati akiruka kutoka kwa kuchimba, hakuna mtu huko.
ref: Lakini alipokimbia kutoka bafuni kujibu, hakuna mtu alikuwepo.

src: He then responded to an ad in the paper.
mt: Baadaye alijibu msaada katika gazeti.
ref: Kisha akajibu tangazo kwenye gazeti.

src: In science he put them on.
mt: Katika sayansi alimwagiza.
ref: Alivaa katika darasa la sayansi.

src: It wound up broken.
mt: Ilipata kufa.
ref: Ilijeruhiwa.

src: After a while, we lost track of our friend.
mt: Baada muda, hatukuweza kujua kama rafiki yetu alikuwa hapa au pale.
ref: Baada ya muda, tulipoteza mawasiliano na rafiki yetu.

src: Then his mom pushed him on the swing and he went really high.
mt: Baadaye mama yake alimwita kwenye mabati na alipofika juu sana.
ref: Kisha mama yake akamsukuma kwenye bembea na akaenda juu sana.

src: Megan and I sat on the curb all afternoon.
mt: Megan na mimi tulipiga kichwa kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Mimi na Megan tulikaa kwenye kizuio mchana wote.

src: When they got there they had a good time.
mt: Wakati wakapata wakapendana.
ref: Walipofika huko walikuwa na wakati mzuri.

src: When he gets home he feels tired but satisfied.
mt: Alipokwenda nyumbani anapata shida lakini anapendelea.
ref: Alipofika nyumbani akahisi amechoka lakini ameridhika.

src: When he is done, he goes inside for a shower.
mt: Baada ya kufanya kazi, anapata maji ya kuchimba.
ref: Akimaliza, anaingia ndani kuoga.

src: Reading them, he saw that his suspicions were true.
mt: Kuendesha, aliona kwamba mashaka yake yalikuwa sahihi.
ref: Akizisoma, aliona kuwa tuhuma zake ni za kweli.

src: Perry was not very happy about that.
mt: Perry alikuwa hatarajiwa kuhuzunika kuhusu hilo.
ref: Perry hakufurahishwa sana na hilo.

src: She added the detergent and fabric softener.
mt: Alifanya kama alivyotaka.

src: When it was over we packed our things and went home.
mt: Baada ya kufika kwa kila kitu, tumekaa nyumbani.
ref: Ilipopita tulifunganya vitu vyetu na tukarudi nyumbani.

src: Because it was an emergency, they saw him right away.
mt: Kwani ilikuwa kesi ya kawaida, walimwona kwa kawaida.
ref: Kwa sababu ilikuwa hali ya dharura, walimwona mara moja.

src: Rufus returns to the bar to get his hat.
mt: Rufus anarudi bar kuipata kofia yake.
ref: Rufus anarudi kwenye baa kuchukua kofia yake.

src: They drove her to the kernel to pick one up.

src: She appreciated the gesture.

src: She was suspended from school for two weeks.
mt: Aliwahiwa kwa miezi miwili.
ref: Alifukuzwa shule kwa wiki mbili.

src: Jane's mother decided that she would give her the recipe.
mt: Mama ya Jane aliamua kuwapa Jane ripoti.
ref: Mama ya Jane akaamua kwamba atampa mapishi hayo.

src: He had gone hungry before so he knew all things must eat.
mt: Alimwaga kabla hivyo, hivyo alijua vyote vina chakula.

src: I made a decision.

src: She was shy but friendly and receptive enough to encourage him.

src: Johnny's team won the game.
mt: Timu ya Johnny ilishinda mchezo.
ref: Timu ya Johnny ilishinda mchezo huo.

src: His teacher wrote a note to his parents.
mt: Alimuandikia baraka kwa wazazi wake.

src: She even mentioned them out loud in phone conversations.
mt: Anayeongea kwa simu anawaeleza wazi.

src: I immediately put it on my phone.
mt: Nilimwambia kwanza kwa simu yangu.
ref: Nikaiweka mara moja kwenye simu yangu.

src: They became a huge success overnight.
mt: Wakawa mafanikio kubwa kwa kipindi cha usiku.
ref: Wakapata mafanikio makubwa mara moja.

src: Her teacher would not let her turn in the homework.
mt: Mwalimu hakuwajibika kwa kuchukua kazi ya nyumbani.

src: The next 8 Years, she studied science in school and college.
mt: Kipindi cha 8 miaka ijayo, alifundishwa kisayansi katika shule na chuo.
ref: Miaka 8 iliyofuata, alisomea sayansi shuleni na katika chuo cha elimu.

mt: Kikundi kimecheza kwa muda na alikuwa kichwani.

mt: Alifika kisha kuchagua magorofa ya kudhibiti na kuwa na wawili.

src: However, she was old enough to work there.
mt: Lakini alikuwa na umri wa kufanya kazi huko.

ref: Chakula kilikuwa kibaya na vyombo havikusafishwa vizuri.

src: Lina had a big pile of clothes that were too small for her kids.
mt: Lina alikuwa na pili kubwa ya vyeti vya kufa kwa watoto wake.
ref: Lina alikuwa na rundo kubwa la nguo ambazo zilikuwa ndogo kwa watoto wake.

src: Then she added her own bananas and ice cream.
mt: Baadaye alifanya kama zile na kula nazi na kivuli.
ref: Kisha akaongeza ndizi zake mwenyewe na aiskrimu.

src: It was lunch time and I was starting to get hungry.
mt: Nilikuwa katika saa ya chakula na nilikuwa kuanza kupata nguvu.

mt: Alipokuwa huko, wote wote wa shule walikuwa wakivutiwa.
ref: Alipofika hapo, shule nzima ilikuwa ikitazama.

src: Her parents found out the next day.
mt: Wazazi wake wakajua siku iliyofuata.

src: He scheduled an appointment with his doctor in a hurry.
mt: Alimkataza wakati mwingine na daktari.

mt: Gari la nyekundu la kawaida lilikuwa chini yake, kwa kuomba kwake kwa kupata.

src: It was two girls.
mt: Waliwahi kuwa wajawazito.

src: After placing items in appropriate places he had to create the hints.
mt: Baada ya kubadilisha vitu katika mahali yatakayopatikana, alifanya kazi ya kutoa maelezo.

src: John and Jake soon became best friends.
mt: John na Jake wakapata wapendao.

mt: Mwalimu alikuwa na uwezo wa kutosha.

src: The workers helped me make a decision.

src: He also loved their delicious food.
mt: Anapenda pia chakula chao cha bora.

mt: Kwa sasa nimepata mabakia mpya kutoka kwa mtandao.

mt: Alimwambia mama yake chakula na dawa.
ref: Mama yake alimpa supu na dawa.

mt: Kwa hatua, fedha zake zilivuka.
ref: Mwishowe, pesa zake ziliisha.

mt: Alitaka kujia kwenye duka lakini lilikuwa limefungwa.

src: She got better quickly

ref: Alipata nafuu kwa haraka

mt: Alifanya lampi hii ndani ya dakika tano.

ref: Siku hiyo ya majaribio, alivunjika kidole chake.

src: She took a deep breath and put on a weak smile.
mt: Alienda kwa hali ya kwanza na kushikilia ujambazi mdogo.

mt: Kwa hiyo, wakati akiingia shule, alitumia maji ya moto zaidi.
ref: Kwa hivyo, alipofika shule, alilazimika kujaza na maji zaidi moto.

src: Eventually, we got pretty good.
mt: Kwa hatua, tulipata vizuri sana.
ref: Hatimaye tukawa wazuri sana.

src: He found one in the area that he lived.
mt: Alipata moja katika eneo ambako alikuwa anavyoishi.
ref: Akapata moja katika eneo analoishi.

src: Amy was grateful.
mt: Amy alikuwa na shukrani.
ref: Amy alishukuru.

mt: Mama yake alimwachia kisabuni.
ref: Mama yake akamnunulia darubini.

mt: Alisema kwa kambiwa wakati wote wanao.

mt: Mama yake alipatikana kwa kasi na kumuacha kwenye kitovu.
ref: Mama yake akatokea mara moja na kumwondoa mbali nayo.

src: Decades later, he went back and used his map to dig it back up.
mt: Kabla ya miaka mingi, alifika tena na kutumia picha yake ya mabati kuangalia kama alikuwa anaweza kujenga tena.

mt: Baadaye, alipita kwenye kadi na kuchangia kwa kila kitu.
