mt: Sasa Mike na Spot wanapanda barabara katika mazingira ya mazingira kila wiki.
ref: Sasa Mike na Spot hutembea pamoja kwenye bustani kila wikendi.

src: He called  up grant.
mt: Alipiga simu kwa kipa.
ref: Alimpigia simu Grant.

src: Every day he applied himself to the endeavor.
mt: Kila siku alifanya kazi yake kwa kujitahidi.
ref: Kila siku alijitolea kwa mwito huo.

src: He eats the lobster with butter and corn on the cob.
mt: Anaeza kwa kanga na mafuta na mafungu.
ref: Akakula kambamiti hiyo pamoja na siagi na mahindi.

src: My dad had to turn on the emergency brake.
mt: Baba yangu alitumia kifaa cha kubadilisha nishati.
ref: Baba yangu alilazimika kuweka breki ya dharura.

src: Ron spent the whole day playing in the snow with his friends.
mt: Ron alikuwa anatumia jioni kwa wenzake kucheza katika barafu.
ref: Ron alichukua siku nzima akicheza kwenye theluji na marafiki wake.

src: Our mother scolded him for it.
mt: Wazazi wetu alimwoga kwa hiyo.
ref: Mama yetu alimkaripia kwa hilo.

src: Brad's mother came home with eggs!
mt: Mama ya Brad alikuja nyumbani na mayai!
ref: Mama ya Brad alikuja nyumbani na mayai!

src: Finally on election day, Paulo was elected to student council.
mt: Kwa sasa katika siku ya uchaguzi Paulo alikuwa na kura kubwa kwa kushinda katika baraza la wanafunzi.
ref: Mwishowe siku ya uchaguzi, Paulo alichaguliwa kwa baraza la wanafunzi.

src: The duck caught up to Patrick and bit him on the leg.
mt: Kambili alikwenda kwa Patrick na kulaani kwa kipenzi.
ref: Bata huo alimfikia Patrick na kumuuma kwenye mguu.

src: However to my dismay I spilled wine all over it.
mt: Lakini kwa hofu yangu nilipima vino kwa kila kitu.
ref: Hata hivyo kwa mshangao wangu nililimwagia wino.

src: I worked out three times week and ate healthy every day.
mt: Nilifanya mazoezi mara tatu kwa wiki na kula bora kila siku.
ref: Nilifanya mazoezi mara tatu kwa wiki na kula vizuri kila siku.

src: Thankfully the Celtics won.
mt: Naam, Celtics waliwahi kushinda.
ref: Kwa uzuri Celtics ilishinda.

src: Even though her girlfriend saw many a day she loved it.
mt: Kwa sababu mpenzi wake alivyoona siku nyingi alivyoahidi, alivyoahidi.
ref: Ijapokuwa mpenzi wake ameona maua mengi alilipenda.

src: He could see land and water on the other side of the mountain.
mt: Aliona nchi na maji kwa upande mwingine wa mlima.
ref: Angeweza kuona nchi kavu na maji upande ule mwingine wa mlima.

src: He eventually just went and got a replacement ID.
mt: Alipokwenda na kupata kitambulisho cha kawaida.
ref: Mwishowe alienda tu na akapata kitambulisho mbadala.

src: In fact, it was so bad that they could barely contain their giggles.
mt: Japo ilikuwa kama vile waliyafanya kazi kubwa, wakati mwingine waliwaza kama watakiwa kufanya kitu.
ref: Kwa kweli, ilikuwa mbaya sana kwamba hangeweza kucheka.

src: The 3 of them had a big dinner at night.
mt: Watu watatu walifika kwa chakula kikubwa kwenye usiku.
ref: Wote 3 walikula chakula cha jioni usiku.

src: Sue called up the fire department.
mt: Sue alipiga simu kwa jeshi la moto.
ref: Sue aliita idara ya kuzima moto.

src: She watched apprehensively.
mt: Aliangalia kwa uangalifu.
ref: Alitazama kwa wasiwasi.

src: It closed down though and now I have to drive far to see movie.
mt: Imekatazwa lakini sasa ninaenda kwa gari kwa wingi ili nione filamu.
ref: Ingawa ilifungwa na sasa lazima niende mbali ili kutazama filamu.

src: I love the car so much.
mt: Nilipenda gari kama hizi.
ref: Ninapenda gari hilo sana.

src: The judges liked the sculpture very much.
mt: Wataalamaji waliangalia sana kifaa hicho.
ref: Majaji walipenda sana sanamu hiyo.

src: When we walked through the front door, she took a big drink of water.
mt: Kama tulipofika kwa punde, aliweka kichwa chake kwenye maji mengi.
ref: Tulipotembea kupitia mlango wa mbele, alikunywa kiasi kikubwa cha maji.

src: The puppy's owner was so relieved to know his puppy was safe!
mt: Malipo alikuwa na furaha kubwa kutambua kwamba pikipi yake alikuwa salama!
ref: Mmiliki wa mtoto huyo wa mbwa alitulia kujua kuwa mbwa wake alikuwa salama!

src: Neiter Mike nor the kids were wearing helmets at the time.
mt: Mike hawakupenda na watoto wake hawakupenda kufanya kama wana kipande cha kichwa wakati huo.
ref: Sio Mike au watoto walikwa wamevaa helmeti wakati huo.

src: Quickly, she checked the timer and realized it never went off.
mt: Kwa haraka, alivichanganya muda na kuelewa kwamba hakukaa.
ref: Kwa haraka, aliangalia kipima saa na akagundua kuwa haikuzima.

src: When he woke up, class was almost over.
mt: Alipokwama, darasa lilikuwa karibu kifunguliwa.
ref: Alipoamka, darasa lilikuwa limekaribia kuisha.

src: Amy repeated her issue to no avail.
mt: Amy alikaribisha swala lake bila mafanikio.
ref: Amy alirudia suala lake bila mafanikio.

src: Sam shrugged and restarted his computer.
mt: Sam alisimama na kurestarti kompyuta yake.
ref: Sam alipuuza na akawasha upya kompyuta yake.

src: They posted an ad online to try to find the owner.
mt: Wakaposti mbele ya mtu mmoja kwa kushirikiana na kupata mwenyeji.
ref: Walichapisha tangazo mtandaoni ili kujaribu kupata mmiliki.

src: He bitterly sat at the piano, playing his scales over and over.
mt: Alisimama kwa nguvu kwenye piano, akilalamika akilalamika.
ref: Alikaa kwa uchungu kwenye piano, akicheza maandishi yake tena na tena.

src: He limps home.
mt: Anatoka nyuma.
ref: Anachechemea nyumbani.

src: His wife arrived to the fire department.
mt: Mke wake alifika katika baraza la moto.
ref: Mkewe akafika kwenye idara ya zimamoto.

src: Keith petted a few of the puppies.
mt: Keith alipiga picha kwa mabwana chache.
ref: Keith alipapasapapasa watoto wachache wa mbwa.

src: After six months, Maria could speak fluent Spanish.
mt: Baada ya miezi sita, Maria alijua kusema kwa Kispanis.
ref: Baada ya miezi sita, Maria aliweza uzungumza Kihispania vizuri.

src: He battled his claustrophobia for two hours.
mt: Alimkabili ugonjwa wake wa kujitetea kwa mabomu kwa masaa mawili.
ref: Alipambana na klaustrofobia yake kwa saa mbili.

src: Soon he and the kid were laughing and playing games.
mt: Kisha muda kidogo wakati wote wawili wakaruka na kucheza michezo.
ref: Muda mfupi baadaye yeye na mtoto walikuwa wakicheka na kucheza michezo.

src: Unfortunately a personal issue derailed his campaign.
mt: Kwa bahati mbaya, shughuli binafsi zilivuruga kampeni yake.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya suala la kibinafsi liliangusha kampeni yake.

src: It then rolled into the creek.
mt: Kisha kubingirika, lilibarikiwa kwenye mto.
ref: Kisha ikaingia kwenye kijito.

src: We went to dinner and a movie.
mt: Tulipokwenda kwa chakula na sinema.
ref: Tulienda kula chakula cha jioni na kutazama sinema.

src: He decided to hike the jungle regardless.
mt: Alisema atakapohamia maeneo ya jangwani bila kujali.
ref: Aliamua kutembea katika msitu bila kujali.

src: Carl showed interest in his dad's bike in the garage.
mt: Carl alishindwa na baba yake kwa moto katika gari.
ref: Carl alionyesha anapendezwa na baiskeli ya baba yake kwenye gereji.

src: By the time she reached the bathroom the gagging had subsided.
mt: Kabla hajaanike kwenye bafu, kuchimba kwa kuchimba kimekauka.
ref: Kufikia wakati alifika bafuni, matapiko yalikuwa yametulia.

src: He studied science and astronomy through high school and college.
mt: Alifundisha sayansi na astronomia kwa shule za juu na chuo.
ref: Alisomea sayansi na falaki kupitia shule ya upili na vyuo vikuu.

src: She was the only one in costume!
mt: Alitakiwa kufanya kazi kama mwanamke pekee!
ref: Alikuwa peke yake katika mavazi maalum!

src: Finally James ran the marathon.
mt: Kwa sasa James aliruka maraton.
ref: Mwishowe James alikimbia mbio za nyika.

src: To my dismay, my reckless biking caused me to get in an accident.
mt: Kwa hofu yangu, biki yangu ya kinyume ilisababisha nikiangaliwa.
ref: Kwa mshtuko wangu, uendeshaji wangu wa bila hadhari ulinisababisha kupata ajali.

src: They continued to whisper.
mt: Wakakaa wakawashika.
ref: Wakaendelea kunong'onezana.

src: It was not on.
mt: Si ilikuwa.
ref: Haikuwa imewashwa.

src: I waited with the lights flashing behind me.
mt: Nilimwamini na mawingu yakiangamia.
ref: Nilisubiri taa zilizokuwa zikiwaka nyuma yangu.

src: She decided to try one of her mother's suggestions out.
mt: Aliamua kujitafuta moja ya mawazo ya mama yake.
ref: Akaamua kujaribu moja ya mapendekezo ya mama yake.

src: On the night of the fight he had won all rounds.
mt: Jana usiku alivunja vyote vya kura.
ref: Usiku wa mapigano alikuwa ameshinda raundi zote.

src: He eats delicious food and drinks many types of wine.
mt: Anaeziwa chakula cha chenye nafasi na anapika vinando vya aina mbalimbali.
ref: Anakula chakula kitamu na kukunywa aina nyingi za divai.

src: Ken then loaded the organ into his truck.
mt: Ken kisha alituma organi kwenye gari lake.
ref: Kisha Ken akapakia kinanda hicho kwenye lori lake.

src: It took 2 weeks for the plants to arrive.
mt: Ilipokea 2 wiki kwa miti.
ref: Ilichukua wiki 2 kabla ya mimea kufika.

src: Luckily, her friends had a sense of humor.
mt: Naam, wenzake wakawa na ujuzi wa kujiamini.
ref: Kwa bahati nzuri, marafiki wake walikuwa na hisia za ucheshi.

src: Eventually Sandra convinced her parents she should get a turtle.
mt: Kwa hatua Sandra alikwambia wazazi wake kwamba alitaka kupata mburugu.
ref: Hatimaye Sandra aliwashawishi wazazi wake anapaswa kupata kobe.

src: Ultimately, they gave up and played something else.
mt: Kwa ujumla, walikataa na kucheza kitu kingine.
ref: Mwishowe, waliacha na wakacheza kitu kingine.

src: He passed all his exams!
mt: Alifaulu kufika kwenye kila mtihani!
ref: Alifaulu mitihani yake yote!

src: She rolled the pinecones in peanut butter and bird seed.
mt: Aliingiza mbegu za mawe kwa maziwa ya kijani na mbegu za mchungwa.
ref: Akakunja sonobari kwenye siagi ya karanga na mbegu ya ndege.

src: We ate our meals, and shared a dessert.
mt: Tulikula chakula chetu, na tulikuwa na mchakato wa kujadili.
ref: Tulikula chakula chetu, na tukashiriki kitandamlo.

src: After eating, she falls asleep on the couch.
mt: Baada ya kula, anapata nafasi ya kukaa kwenye sofa.
ref: Baada ya kula, analala kwenye kochi.

src: Many Year's later, Han and Leia had a child.
mt: Baadaye miongoni mwa miaka, Han na Leia wana mtoto.
ref: Miaka mingi baadaye, Han na Leia walipata mtoto.

src: Gina pretended it wasn't her phone.
mt: Gina alimwambia siyo simu yake.
ref: Gina alijifanya sio simu yake.

src: Her anxiety is now under control.
mt: Ugonjwa wake wa hofu sasa umekwama.
ref: Wasiwasi wake sasa unadhibitiwa.

src: Worried, Jan went to the door of the class to find her daughter.
mt: Jan alikuwa na wasiwasi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika kwa pamoja na mchakato wa kufanya kazi, akafika
ref: Akiwa na wasiwasi, Jan alienda kwenye mlango wa darasa kumtafuta binti yake.

src: Sarah broke her big toe.
mt: Sarah alitupilia mdomo wake mkubwa.
ref: Sarah alivunja kidole chake kikubwa.

src: He realizes he should have moved to New Jersey Years ago.
mt: Anasikitika kwa kuacha kuhamia New Jersey miaka mingi iliyopita.
ref: Anatambua angefaa kuhamia New Jersey Miaka iliyopita.

src: He was nervous.
mt: Alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: Her roommate began wearing headphones.
mt: Mkeaji alianza kupaka kofia za kupiga muziki.
ref: Mkazi mwenza wake akaanza kuvaa vipokea sauti vya masikioni.

src: While working out, Pete worked up a sweat.
mt: Kutokana na kufanya mazoezi, Pete alifanya kazi.
ref: Akifanya mazoezi, Pete alitokwa na jasho.

src: And Clare began feeling hot.
mt: Na Clare kuanza kuwa na moto.
ref: Na Clare akaanza kuhisi joto.

src: After a week, it was time to collect her pay.
mt: Baada ya wiki, ilikuwa wakati wa kupata kipato chake.
ref: Baada ya wiki, ilikuwa wakati wa kukusanya malipo yake.

src: Gina racked her brain but could find nothing to say.
mt: Gina alitafakari kwa kichwa, lakini hakutambua kitu chochote kusema.
ref: Gina alifikiria sana lakini hakupata cha kusema.

src: Finally, he realized the problem.
mt: Kisha, alijua changamoto.
ref: Mwishowe, aligundua tatizo.

src: The requester was very responsive and decided to talk to me.
mt: Wakili alikuwa na ujasiri sana na kujadili na mimi.
ref: Mwombaji alikuwa msikivu sana na aliamua kuzungumza nami.

src: Stacey shared her chips with Kevin.
mt: Stacey alishirikiana chips za yake na Kevin.
ref: Stacey akashiriki chipsi zake na Kevin.

src: Glen becomes outraged.
mt: Glen anapokatika.
ref: Glen anakasirika.

src: Thankfully the pay was good.
mt: Na kwa bahati mbaya, kipato kilikuwa kama vile vile.
ref: Kwa nzuri malipo yalikuwa mazuri.

src: Driving, eating, and sleeping were the only reasons we would stop.
mt: Kuendesha, kula na kupumzika ndio tu sababu zinazotaka tukatupite.
ref: Kuendesha gari, kula, na kulala ndizo sababu pekee ambazo tungeweza kusimama.

src: Gill started acting like Columbo sometimes.
mt: Gill alianza kufanya kama Columbo mara nyingi.
ref: Wakati mwingine Gill alianza kutenda kama Columbo.

src: He missed his second to last one.
mt: Alisahau kile cha mwisho wa pili.
ref: Alikosa ya yake ya pili hadi ya mwisho.

src: The other man struggled but he was too weak to prevent his own demise.
mt: Kiongozi mwingine alikataa lakini alikuwa mdogo sana kwa kudhibiti kifo chake.
ref: Mwanaume huyo mwingine alijitahidi lakini alikuwa mdhaifu sana kuzuia kifo chake.

src: A doctor looked at it and told Ivan the bite was infected!
mt: Daktari alimwangamia na kusema kinywaji kilikuwa chafu!
ref: Daktari aliiangalia na akamwambia Ivan kuwa muumo ulikuwa umeambukizwa!

src: She fell behind in her studies.
mt: Aliingia katika kasi.
ref: Aliachwa nyuma katika masomo yake.

src: She said yes, and they had a good time.
mt: Alisema neno, na wakati mwingine waliwaza.
ref: Alisema ndiyo, na walikuwa na wakati mzuri.

src: He starts playing a song.
mt: Anafanya kucheza nyimbo.
ref: Anaanza kucheza wimbo.

src: They stepped in the cars and put on their seatbelts.
mt: Wakati wao wakapanda ndege, wakapanda ndege na kufunga zile za kando.
ref: Wakaingia kwenye magari na kufunga mikanda yao.
